The Book of Psalms

Psalm 1

1 blessed ⁼man ⁼which not was·gone in to·counsel of·irreverent⁺ and in to·path of·sinner⁺ not stood and upon °¬seat of·¬pestilences⁺ not ¬seated

2 but or in to·the ⁼law of·lord the ⁼will of·him and in to·the ⁼law of·him will·¬meditate of·day and of·night

3 and will·be·himself as the ⁼¬wood ⁼the ⁼having·been·¬planted ¬from °the⁺ ⁼¬thoroughfares⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼waters⁺ which °the ⁼fruit of·it will·give in to·¬time of·it and the ⁼¬leaf of·it not will·¬be·perplexed·himself and all⁺ °whatever⁺ iᵮ should·do will·be·¬greatlied·prosper

4 not thus the⁺ ⁼irreverent⁺ not thus but or as the ⁼dust °which ¬casts·forth the ⁼¬wind off of·face of·the ⁼earth

5 through °this not they·will·stand·uꝑ·themselves irreverent⁺ in to·judgment not·then sinner⁺ in to·counsel of·just⁺

6 ¬that knows lord °path of·just⁺ and path of·irreverent⁺ will·destroy·himself

Psalm 2

1 so·that °what they·¬raged nations⁺ and peoples⁺ they·¬meditated °empty⁺

2 they·¬stood·by the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ of·the ⁼earth and the⁺ ⁼¬leaders⁺ they·were·¬assembled upon °the °it ¬by of·the ⁼lord and ¬by of·the ⁼Christ of·him ¬pause

3 we·should·¬tear °the⁺ ⁼bonds⁺ of·them and we·should·¬throw·off off of·us °the ⁼yoke of·them

4 the ⁼housing·down in to·heavens⁺ ¬laughs·out·loud·himself °them and the ⁼lord will·¬ridicule °them

5 ŧhen will·speak unto °them in to·raging of·him and in to·the ⁼¬wrath of·him will·¬trouble °them

6 I* then I·was·¬appointed king ¬by of·him upon °¬Zion ⁼mountain ⁼the ⁼holy of·him

7 ¬announcing °the ⁼order of·lord lord told unto °me son of·me you·are you I* today I·have·engendered °you

8 ꜝrequest·yourself ¬from myˊ and I·will·give to·you °nations⁺ °the ⁼law-lot of·you and °the ⁼¬possession of·you °the⁺ ⁼¬ends⁺ of·the ⁼earth

9 you·will·¬flocksman °them in to·staff ⁼iron as °¬vessel of·potter you·will·¬break °them

10 and now kings⁺ ꜝ¬understand⁺ you⁺·should·be·¬instructed all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼judging °the ⁼earth

11 ꜝserve⁺ to·the ⁼lord in to·fear and ꜝ¬rejoice⁺·yourselves⁺ to·him in to·¬trembling

12 ꜝ¬catch⁺·yourselves⁺ °¬disciplines⁺ ¬lest should·be·enraged lord and you⁺·will·destroy·yourselves⁺ out of·path ⁼just ¬when should·be·¬been·enflamed in to·¬quick the ⁼¬wrath of·him blessed⁺ ⁼all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·¬persuaded upon to·him

Psalm 3

1 psalm to·the ⁼David ¬when ¬ran·away off of·face Abessalōm ⁼the ⁼son of·him

2 lord °what they·were·multiplied the⁺ ⁼¬pressing·on °me many⁺ they·¬rebel·against·themselves upon °me*

3 many⁺ they·say to·the ⁼soul of·me not is salvation to·him in to·the ⁼God of·him ¬pause

4 you then lord ¬shielder of·me you·are glory of·me and upping °the ⁼head of·me

5 to·voice of·me unto °lord I·cried and ¬listened·to of·me out of·mountain ⁼holy of·him ¬pause

6 I* I·was·bedded and I·slept I·was·¬raised ¬that lord will·¬help·himself of·me

7 not I·will·be·afraid off of·myriads⁺ of·people of·the·ones⁺ encircling of·self-¬joining·in·making·an·attack to·me

8 ꜝstand·uꝑ lord ꜝsave °me the ⁼God of·me ¬that you you·struck °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼enemies to·me ¬acting·in·folly °teeth⁺ of·sinner⁺ you·¬broke

9 of·the ⁼lord the ⁼salvation and upon °the ⁼people of·you the ⁼¬praise of·you

Psalm 4

1 to °the ⁼completion in to·psalms⁺ song to·the ⁼David

2 in to·the·one to·self-¬call °me listened·to of·me the ⁼God of·the ⁼justice of·me in to·¬pressure you·broadened to·me ꜝ¬have·compassion °me and ꜝlisten·to of·the ⁼prayer of·me

3 sons⁺ of·humans⁺ till ¬when? ¬heavy-hearted⁺ so·that °what you⁺·love °vanity and you⁺·seek °lie ¬pause

4 and ꜝknow⁺ ¬that ¬caused·wonder lord °the ⁼sacred of·him lord will·listen·to·himself of·me in to·the·one to·have·cried °me unto °him

5 ꜝenrage⁺·yourselves⁺ and ńot ꜝsin⁺ ꜝsay⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼hearts⁺ of·you⁺ and upon to·the⁺ ⁼beds⁺ of·you⁺ ꜝbe·¬pierced⁺ ¬pause

6 ꜝ¬sacrifice⁺ °¬sacrifice of·justice and ꜝhope⁺ upon °lord

7 many⁺ they·say what will·show to·us °the⁺ ⁼good⁺ was·¬noted upon °us the ⁼light of·the ⁼face of·you lord

8 you·gave °¬joy to °the ⁼heart of·me off of·¬time ⁼¬grain and of·wine and of·¬olive·oil of·them they·were·multiplied

9 in to·peace upon °the °it I·will·be·bedded and I·will·sleep ¬that you lord ¬by °only⁺ upon to·hope you·housed·down °me

Psalm 5

1 to °the ⁼completion over of·the ⁼¬inheriting psalm to·the ⁼David

2 °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ of·me ꜝ¬listen·to·yourself lord ꜝ¬understand of·the ⁼cry of·me

3 ꜝ¬watch·out to·the ⁼voice of·the ⁼¬petition of·me the ⁼king of·me and the ⁼God of·me ¬that unto °you I·will·pray·myself lord

4 °the·one early you·will·listen·to·yourself of·the ⁼voice of·me °the·one early I·will·¬stand·by·myself to·you and I·will·¬look·upon·myself

5 ¬that ¬not! God ⁼willing °¬lawlessness you you·are not·then will·¬be·a·stranger to·you self-¬acting·wickedly

6 not they·will·¬remain ¬lawbreaker⁺ ¬before of·the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·you you·¬hated °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-working °the ⁼¬lawlessness

7 you·will·destroy °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼speaking °the ⁼lie °man of·bloods⁺ and °¬deceitful ¬abhors·himself lord

8 I* then in to·the ⁼multitude of·the ⁼mercy of·you I·will·come·to·myself to °the ⁼house of·you I·will·worship unto °temple ⁼holy of·you in to·fear of·you

9 lord ꜝ¬guide °me in to·the ⁼justice of·you ¬because·of of·the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·me ꜝ¬guide in·the·eye of·me °the ⁼path of·you

10 ¬that not is in to·the ⁼mouth of·them ¬truth ⁼the ⁼heart of·them vain tomb ⁼having·self-¬opened ⁼the ⁼¬throat of·them to·the⁺ ⁼tongues⁺ of·them they·¬deceived

11 ꜝjudge °them the ⁼God ꜝlet·them·¬fall·from⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼¬deliberations⁺ of·them ¬by °the ⁼multitude of·the⁺ ⁼irreverences⁺ of·them ꜝ¬expel °them ¬that they·¬rebelled °you lord

12 and ꜝlet·them·be·¬celebrated⁺ all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼hoping upon °you to °eternity they·will·¬rejoice·themselves and you·will·¬dwell in to·them and they·will·¬boast·themselves in to·you all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼loving °the ⁼name of·you

13 ¬that you you·will·¬praise °just lord as to·¬armor of·¬goodwill you·crowned °us

Psalm 6

1 to °the ⁼completion in to·hymns⁺ over of·the ⁼eighth psalm to·the ⁼David

2 lord ńot to·the ⁼¬wrath of·you you·should·¬rebuke °me ńot·then to·the ⁼raging of·you you·should·¬instruct °me

3 ꜝ¬have·mercy °me lord ¬that infirm I·am ꜝ¬heal·yourself °me lord ¬that was·¬troubled the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·me

4 and the ⁼soul of·me was·¬troubled very and you lord till ¬when?

5 ꜝ¬turn lord ꜝ¬rescue·yourself °the ⁼soul of·me ꜝsave °me ¬because·of of·the ⁼mercy of·you

6 ¬that not is in to·the ⁼death the ⁼remembering of·you in then to·the ⁼¬hell what will·¬agree·himself to·you

7 I·labored in to·the ⁼¬groan of·me I·will·bathe ¬by °each ⁼night ⁼the ⁼¬bed of·me in to·¬teardrops⁺ of·me °the ⁼¬strewn·bed of·me I·will·¬rain·down

8 was·¬troubled off of·¬wrath the ⁼eye of·me I·was·¬getted·old in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·me

9 ꜝ¬leave⁺ off myˊ all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-working °the ⁼¬lawlessness ¬that listened·to lord of·the ⁼voice of·the ⁼¬weeping of·me

10 listened·to lord of·the ⁼¬petition of·me lord °the ⁼prayer of·me ¬waited·for·himself

11 may·they·be·¬been·ashamed and may·they·be·¬troubled very all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·me may·they·be·¬turned·away and may·they·be·¬dishonored very through of·¬speed

Psalm 7

1 psalm to·the ⁼David °which sang to·the ⁼lord over of·the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ Chousi ⁼son ⁼¬Benjamin

2 lord the ⁼God of·me upon to·you I·hoped ꜝsave °me out of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬pursuing °me and ꜝ¬rescue·yourself °me

3 ¬lest should·¬seize as lion °the ⁼soul of·me ńot of·being ⁼self-¬ransoming ńot·then of·saving

4 lord the ⁼God of·me if I·did °this if is ¬unrighteousness in to·hands⁺ of·me

5 if I·¬repayed to·the⁺ ⁼¬repaying to·me °bad⁺ may·¬fall·from ¬therefore off of·the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·me empty

6 ꜝ¬seek·yourself ¬therefore the ⁼enemy °the ⁼soul of·me and may·¬grasp and ꜝ¬trample·yourself to °earth ⁼the ⁼life of·me and °the ⁼glory of·me to °dust ꜝ¬dwell·yourself ¬pause

7 ꜝstand·uꝑ lord in to·raging of·you ꜝbe·upped in to·the⁺ ⁼¬ends⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·me ꜝbe·¬raised lord the ⁼God of·me in to·order ⁼which you·commanded·yourself

8 and ¬synagogue of·peoples⁺ will·encircle °you and over of·this to °upwardness ꜝ¬turn

9 lord will·judge °peoples⁺ ꜝjudge °me lord ¬by °the ⁼justice of·me and ¬by °the ⁼¬innocence of·me upon to·me*

10 ꜝlet·be·¬completed ¬so evil of·sinner⁺ and you·will·¬guide °just ¬chastising °hearts⁺ and °kidneys⁺ the ⁼God

11 just ⁼the ⁼¬help of·me ¬from of·the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼saving °the⁺ ⁼¬straight⁺ to·the ⁼heart

12 the ⁼God ⁼judge ⁼just and strong and ¬lenient ńot °raging ¬bringing·upon ¬by °each ⁼day

13 ifᵮ ńot you⁺·should·be·¬turned °the ⁼sword of·him will·¬shine °the ⁼¬bow of·him ¬stretched·tight and prepared °it

14 and in to·him prepared °¬vessels⁺ of·death °the⁺ ⁼¬arrows⁺ of·him to·the⁺ ⁼self-¬kindling ¬completed·himself

15 ¬¡see! ¬was·in·labor °¬unrighteousness ¬seized °evil and enchilded °¬lawlessness

16 °pit ¬dug and ¬dug·up °him and will·¬fall·into·himself to °¬cesspool ⁼which worked·himself

17 will·¬turn the ⁼evil of·him to °head of·him and upon °¬head of·him the ⁼¬unrighteousness of·him will·descend·himself

18 I·will·¬agree·myself to·lord ¬by °the ⁼justice of·him and I·will·psalm to·the ⁼name of·lord ⁼the ⁼Upmost

Psalm 8

1 to °the ⁼completion over of·the⁺ ⁼¬winepresses⁺ psalm to·the ⁼David

2 lord the ⁼lord of·us as ¬marvellous ⁼the ⁼name of·you in to·all ⁼the ⁼earth ¬that was·¬lifted·up the ⁼¬majesty of·you ¬above of·the⁺ ⁼heavens⁺

3 out of·mouth of·¬infant⁺ and of·suckling you·¬completed·yourself °praise ¬because·of of·the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·you of·the·one to·¬destroy °enemy and °¬avenger

4 ¬that I·will·see·myself °the⁺ ⁼heavens⁺ °works⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼fingers⁺ of·you °luna and °stars⁺ °which⁺ you you·founded

5 what is human ¬that you·memory·yourself of·him or son of·human ¬that you·¬oversee·yourself °him

6 you·¬made·less °him °¬little ⁼whatever ¬from °announcers⁺ to·glory and to·honor you·crowned °him

7 and you·¬appointed °him upon °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you °all⁺ you·¬subjected ¬under of·the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·him

8 °sheep⁺ and °¬oxes⁺ ⁼all⁺ still then and °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·the ⁼plain

9 °the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and °the⁺ ⁼fishes⁺ of·the ⁼sea °the⁺ ⁼self-¬going·through °¬paths⁺ of·seas⁺

10 lord the ⁼lord of·us as ¬marvellous ⁼the ⁼name of·you in to·all ⁼the ⁼earth

Psalm 9

1 to °the ⁼completion over of·the⁺ ⁼¬private⁺ of·the ⁼son psalm to·the ⁼David

2 I·will·¬agree·myself to·you lord in to·whole ⁼heart of·me I·will·¬relate·fully·myself °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬marvelous⁺ of·you

3 I·will·be·¬celebrated and I·will·¬rejoice·myself in to·you I·will·psalm to·the ⁼name of·you Upmost

4 in to·the·one to·be·¬turned·away °the ⁼enemy of·me to °the·ones⁺ ¬after they·will·be·infirm and they·will·destroy·themselves off of·face of·you

5 ¬that you·did °the ⁼judgment of·me and °the ⁼¬condemnation of·me you·¬seated upon of·throne the ⁼judging °justice

6 you·¬rebuked to·nations⁺ and destroyed·himself the ⁼irreverent °the ⁼name of·them you·¬blotted·out to °the ⁼eternity and to °the ⁼eternity of·the ⁼eternity

7 ⁼the ⁼enemy they·¬failed the⁺ ⁼swords⁺ to °completion and °cities⁺ you·¬took·down destroyed·himself the ⁼memorial of·them with °¬sounds⁺

8 and the ⁼lord to °the ⁼eternity remains prepared in to·judgment °the ⁼throne of·him

9 and he will·judge °the ⁼¬world in to·justice will·judge °peoples⁺ in to·¬righteousness

10 and was·generated·himself lord ¬refuge to·the ⁼¬poor ¬helper in to·¬opportunities⁺ in to·¬pressure

11 and ꜝlet·them·hope⁺ upon °you the⁺ ⁼knowing °the ⁼name of·you ¬that not you·left·out °the⁺ ⁼seeking·out °you lord

12 ꜝpsalm⁺ to·the ⁼lord ⁼the ⁼housing·down in to·¬Zion ꜝ¬announce⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬practices⁺ of·him

13 ¬that seeking·out °the⁺ ⁼bloods⁺ of·them was·memoried not ¬forgot·himself of·the ⁼cry of·the⁺ ⁼¬poors⁺

14 ꜝ¬have·mercy °me lord ꜝsee °the ⁼¬lowliness of·me out of·the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·me the ⁼upping °me out of·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·the ⁼death

15 ¬that iᵮ I·should·¬announce °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼praises⁺ of·you in to·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·the ⁼daughter of·¬Zion I·will·¬rejoice·myself upon to·the ⁼salvation of·you

16 they·were·¬sticked·into nations⁺ in to·¬decay ⁼which they·did in to·¬trap ⁼this ⁼which they·hid was·¬seized the ⁼foot of·them

17 knows·himself lord °judgments⁺ doing in to·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·him was·¬seized the ⁼sinner song ¬???

18 ꜝlet·them·be·¬turned·away⁺ the⁺ ⁼sinner⁺ to °the ⁼¬hell all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬forgetting of·the ⁼God

19 ¬that not to °completion will·be·¬forgotten the ⁼poor the ⁼¬perseverance of·the⁺ ⁼¬poors⁺ not will·destroy·himself to °the ⁼eternity

20 ꜝstand·uꝑ lord ńot ꜝlet·grow·mighty·himself human ꜝlet·them·be·judged⁺ nations⁺ in·the·eye of·you

21 ꜝ¬appoint lord °¬lawgiver upon °them ꜝlet·them·know⁺ °nations⁺ ¬that humans⁺ they·are ¬pause

22 so·that °what lord you·have·¬left ¬from·afar you·¬neglect in to·¬opportunities⁺ in to·¬pressure

23 in to·the·one to·self-¬be·prideful °the ⁼irreverent ¬burns·himself the ⁼poor they·¬seize·themselves in to·¬deliberations⁺ to·which⁺ they·¬discuss·themselves

24 ¬that ¬praises·himself the ⁼sinner in to·the⁺ ⁼¬desires⁺ of·the ⁼soul of·him and the ⁼¬harming ¬is·blessed·himself

25 ¬provoked °the ⁼lord the ⁼sinner ¬by °the ⁼multitude of·the ⁼raging of·him not will·seek·out not is the ⁼God in·the·eye of·him

26 they·¬profane·themselves the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·him in to·all ⁼¬time ¬takes·away·in·return·himself °the⁺ ⁼judgments⁺ of·you off of·face of·him of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·him will·¬master

27 for told in to·heart of·him not ńot I·should·be·¬shaken off of·generation to °generation ¬without of·bad

28 ⁼which of·curse °the ⁼mouth of·him ¬is·full and of·¬bitterness and of·¬deceit ¬by °the ⁼tongue of·him labor and evil

29 ¬lies·in·wait·himself to·¬plot with of·rich⁺ in to·¬concealed⁺ to·kill·off °¬innocent the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·him to °the ⁼¬poor they·¬look·ahead

30 ¬ambushes in to·¬concealed as lion in to·the ⁼¬haven of·him ¬ambushes of·the·one to·¬seize °poor to·¬seize °poor in to·the·one to·¬draw °him

31 in to·the ⁼¬trap of·him to·¬lowliness °him will·¬stoop and will·¬collapse·himself in to·the·one °him to·¬master of·the⁺ ⁼¬poors⁺

32 for told in to·heart of·him I·have·¬forgotten·myself the ⁼God ¬turned·away °the ⁼face of·him of·the·one ńot to·look·at to °completion

33 ꜝstand·uꝑ lord the ⁼God ꜝlet·be·upped the ⁼hand of·you ńot should·¬forget of·the⁺ ⁼¬poors⁺

34 ¬because·of of·what ¬provoked the ⁼irreverent °the ⁼God for told in to·heart of·him not will·seek·out

35 you·look·at ¬that you °evil and °¬wrath you·¬observe of·the·one to·¬deliver °them to °hands⁺ of·you to·you therefore has·left·out·himself the ⁼poor to·orphan you you·were of·¬helpers⁺

36 ꜝ¬break °the ⁼arm of·the ⁼sinner and of·evil will·be·sought the ⁼sin of·him and not ńot should·be·found through °her

37 will·become·king lord to °the ⁼eternity and to °the ⁼eternity of·the ⁼eternity you⁺·will·destroy·yourselves⁺ nations⁺ out of·the ⁼earth of·him

38 °the ⁼¬desire of·the⁺ ⁼¬poors⁺ listened·to lord °the ⁼preparation of·the ⁼heart of·them ¬watched·out °the ⁼ear of·you

39 to·judge to·orphan and to·¬lowly so·that ńot should·¬add still of·the·one to·¬boast human upon of·the ⁼earth

Psalm 10

1 to °the ⁼completion psalm to·the ⁼David upon to·the ⁼lord I·have·¬persuaded all you⁺·will·¬say to·the ⁼soul of·me ꜝ¬migrate·yourself upon °the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ as ¬sparrow

2 ¬that ¬¡see! the⁺ ⁼sinner⁺ they·¬stretched·tight °¬bow they·prepared °¬arrows⁺ to °¬quiver of·the·one to·¬shoot·down in to·moondark °the⁺ ⁼¬straight⁺ to·the ⁼heart

3 ¬that °which⁺ you·¬completed·yourself they·¬took·down then the ⁼just °what did

4 lord in to·temple ⁼holy of·him lord in to·heaven the ⁼throne of·him the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·him to °the ⁼¬poor they·¬look·ahead the⁺ ⁼¬eyelids⁺ of·him ¬finds·out °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺

5 lord ¬finds·out °the ⁼just and °the·one °irreverent⁺ then the ⁼loving °¬unrighteousness ¬hates °the·one of·himself °soul

6 will·¬rain·upon upon °sinner⁺ °¬traps⁺ °fire and °¬divine and °breath of·¬blast the ⁼part of·the ⁼drinkcup of·them

7 ¬that just ⁼lord and °justices⁺ loved °¬righteousness saw °the ⁼face of·him

Psalm 11

1 to °the ⁼completion over of·the ⁼eighth psalm to·the ⁼David

2 ꜝsave °me lord ¬that has·¬failed sacred ¬that they·were·¬lessened the⁺ ⁼¬truths⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼humans⁺

3 °vain⁺ spoke each unto °the ⁼¬neighbor of·him °lips⁺ ⁼¬deceitful⁺ in to·heart and in to·heart they·spoke

4 ꜝdestroy·yourself lord °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼lips⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬deceitful⁺ and °tongue ¬???

5 °the⁺ ⁼¬saying °the ⁼tongue of·us we·¬greaten the⁺ ⁼lips⁺ of·us ¬from of·us is what of·us lord is

6 off of·the ⁼¬misery of·the⁺ ⁼poor⁺ and off of·the ⁼¬groan of·the⁺ ⁼¬poors⁺ now I·will·stand·uꝑ·myself says lord I·will·put·myself in to·salvation I·will·¬preach·boldly·myself in to·him

7 the⁺ ⁼¬oracleses⁺ of·lord ¬oracleses⁺ ⁼pure⁺ silver ⁼having·been·¬burned ⁼¬testing to·the ⁼earth having·been·cleansed ¬seven-fold

8 you lord you·will·keep °us and you·will·¬keep °us off of·the ⁼generation ⁼this and to °the ⁼eternity

9 encircling the⁺ ⁼irreverent⁺ they·¬walk ¬by °the ⁼upwardness of·you you·¬took·great·care °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺

Psalm 12

1 to °the ⁼completion psalm to·the ⁼David

2 till ¬when? lord you·will·¬forget·yourself of·me to °completion till ¬when? you·will·¬turn·away °the ⁼face of·you off myˊ

3 till of·what I·will·put·myself °counsels⁺ in to·soul of·me °¬anguishes⁺ in to·heart of·me of·day till ¬when? will·be·upped the ⁼enemy of·me upon °me*

4 ꜝ¬look·upon ꜝlisten·to of·me lord the ⁼God of·me ꜝlight °the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·me ¬lest I·should·sleep to °death

5 ¬lest should·tell the ⁼enemy of·me I·was·strong unto °him the⁺ ⁼¬pressing·on °me they·will·¬rejoice·themselves ifᵮ I·should·be·¬shaken

6 I* then upon to·the ⁼mercy of·you I·hoped will·¬rejoice·himself the ⁼heart of·me upon to·the ⁼salvation of·you I·will·sing to·the ⁼lord ⁼the ⁼¬doing·good °me and I·will·psalm to·the ⁼name of·lord of·the ⁼Upmost

Psalm 13

1 to °the ⁼completion psalm to·the ⁼David told ¬foolish in to·heart of·him not is God they·¬destroyed and they·were·¬abhorred in to·¬practices⁺ not is doing °¬kindness not is till of·one

2 lord out of·the ⁼heaven ¬looked·through upon °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ of·the·one to·see if is ¬understanding or seeking·out °the ⁼God

3 all⁺ they·¬turned·from ¬together they·were·¬made·worthless not is doing °¬kindness not is till of·one tomb ⁼having·self-¬opened ⁼the ⁼¬throat of·them to·the⁺ ⁼tongues⁺ of·them they·¬deceived ¬poison of·asps⁺ ¬by °the⁺ ⁼lips⁺ of·them ⁼which⁺ the ⁼mouth °curses⁺ and °¬bitternesses⁺ ¬is·full ¬sharp⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·them to·pour·out °blood ¬ruin and ¬misery in to·the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·them and °path of·peace not they·knew not is fear of·God ¬opposite of·the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·them

4 ¬not! they·will·know·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-working °the ⁼¬lawlessness the⁺ ⁼¬devouring °the ⁼people of·me to·¬eating of·bread °the ⁼lord not they·¬called·themselves

5 there they·¬were·timid to·fear of·which not was fear ¬that the ⁼God in to·generation ⁼just

6 °counsel of·poor you⁺·¬dishonored ¬that lord hope of·him is

7 what will·give out of·¬Zion °the ⁼salvation of·the ⁼Yisra’el in to·the·one to·¬turn °lord °the ⁼battlechained of·the ⁼people of·him ꜝlet·¬rejoice·himself Ya‘aqob and ꜝlet·be·¬celebrated Yisra’el

Psalm 14

1 ⁼psalm to·the ⁼David lord what will·¬be·a·stranger in to·the ⁼dwelling of·you and what will·¬dwell in to·the ⁼mountain ⁼the ⁼holy of·you

2 self-going ⁼¬blameless and self-working °justice speaking °¬truth in to·heart of·him

3 which not ¬distorted in to·tongue of·him not·then did to·the ⁼¬neighbor of·him °bad and °¬reproach not took upon °the·ones⁺ ¬near of·him

4 should·be·¬been·rejected in·the·eye of·him self-¬acting·wickedly then °the⁺ ⁼self-fearing °lord glorifies the ⁼swearing to·the ⁼¬neighbor of·him and not ¬rejecting

5 °the ⁼silver of·him not gave upon to·¬interest and °¬gifts⁺ upon to·¬innocent⁺ not took the ⁼doing °these⁺ not will·be·¬shaken to °the ⁼eternity

Psalm 15

1 ¬inscription·on·a·monument to·the ⁼David ꜝkeep °me lord ¬that upon to·you I·hoped

2 I·told to·the ⁼lord lord of·me you·are you ¬that of·the⁺ ⁼good⁺ of·me not °need you·have

3 to·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ in to·the ⁼earth of·him ¬caused·wonder all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼wills⁺ of·him in to·them

4 they·were·multiplied the⁺ ⁼infirmities⁺ of·them with °these⁺ they·¬hastened not ńot I·should·¬assemble °the⁺ ⁼¬synagogues⁺ of·them out of·bloods⁺ not·then ńot I·should·be·memoried of·the⁺ ⁼names⁺ of·them through of·lips⁺ of·me

5 lord the ⁼part of·the ⁼law-lot of·me and of·the ⁼drinkcup of·me you you·are the ⁼¬restoring °the ⁼law-lot of·me to·me*

6 ¬ropes⁺ they·¬fell to·me in to·the⁺ ⁼¬stronger⁺ for and the ⁼law-lot of·me ¬stronger to·me is

7 I·will·¬praise °the ⁼lord ⁼the ⁼¬bringing·understanding·to °me still then and till of·night they·¬instructed °me the⁺ ⁼kidneys⁺ of·me

8 I·¬foreseed·myself °the ⁼lord in·the·eye of·me through of·all ¬that out of·right⁺ of·me is so·that ńot I·should·be·¬shaken

9 through °this was·¬celebrated the ⁼heart of·me and ¬rejoiced·himself the ⁼tongue of·me still then and the ⁼flesh of·me will·¬dwell upon to·hope

10 ¬that not you·will·leave·out °the ⁼soul of·me to °¬hell not·then you·will·give °the ⁼sacred of·you to·see °¬decay

11 you·made·known to·me °paths⁺ of·life you·will·fulfill °me of·¬joy with of·the ⁼face of·you ¬delightfulnesses⁺ in to·the ⁼right of·you to °completion

Psalm 16

1 prayer of·the ⁼David ꜝlisten·to lord of·the ⁼justice of·me ꜝ¬watch·out to·the ⁼¬petition of·me to·¬listen·to of·the ⁼prayer of·me not in to·lips⁺ ⁼¬deceitful⁺

2 out of·face of·you the ⁼judgment of·me may·come·out the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·me ꜝlet·them·see⁺ °¬righteousnesses⁺

3 you·¬tested °the ⁼heart of·me you·¬overseed·yourself of·night you·¬burned °me and not was·found in to·me* ¬unrighteousness

4 ¬that iᵮ ńot you·will·speak·yourself the ⁼mouth of·me °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ through °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼lips⁺ of·you I* I·kept °paths⁺ ⁼hard⁺

5 ꜝ¬complete·yourself °the⁺ ⁼¬footsteps⁺ of·me in to·the⁺ ⁼¬paths⁺ of·you so·that ńot they·should·be·¬shaken the⁺ ⁼¬footsteps⁺ of·me

6 I* I·cried ¬that you·¬listened·to of·me the ⁼God ꜝ¬bow °the ⁼ear of·you to·me* and ꜝlisten·to of·the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ of·me

7 ꜝ¬cause·wonder °the⁺ ⁼mercies⁺ of·you the ⁼saving °the⁺ ⁼hoping upon °you out of·the⁺ ⁼having·¬opposed to·the ⁼right of·you

8 ꜝkeep °me as °¬pupil of·eye in to·¬shelter of·the⁺ ⁼wings⁺ of·you you·will·¬shelter °me

9 off of·face of·irreverent⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬grieving °me the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·me °the ⁼soul of·me they·¬contained

10 °the ⁼fat of·them they·¬confined the ⁼mouth of·them spoke °¬pride

11 throwing·out °me now they·¬surrounded °me °the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·them they·put·themselves to·¬turn·from in to·the ⁼earth

12 they·¬took·up °me ¬like lion ⁼prepared to °¬trap and ¬like ¬cub of·houses⁺ in to·¬concealed⁺

13 ꜝstand·uꝑ lord ꜝ¬come·before °them and ꜝ¬trip·up °them ꜝ¬rescue·yourself °the ⁼soul of·me off of·irreverent °sword of·you off of·enemies⁺ of·the ⁼hand of·you

14 lord off of·¬few⁺ off of·earth ꜝ¬divide °them in to·the ⁼life of·them and of·the⁺ ⁼having·self-hidden of·you was·filled the ⁼womb of·them they·were·¬feeded of·sons⁺ and they·¬released °the⁺ ⁼¬remaining⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼¬infant⁺ of·them

15 I* then in to·justice I·will·be·seen to·the ⁼face of·you I·will·be·¬feeded in to·the·one to·be·seen °the ⁼glory of·you

Psalm 17

1 to °the ⁼completion to·the ⁼kid of·lord to·the ⁼David °which⁺ spoke to·the ⁼lord °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·the ⁼song ⁼this in to·day ⁼which ¬rescued·himself °him lord out of·hand of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·him and out of·hand of·Sha’ul

2 and told I·will·love °you lord the ⁼strength of·me

3 lord ¬firmness of·me and ¬refuge of·me and ¬rescuer of·me the ⁼God of·me ¬helper of·me and I·will·hope upon °him ¬defender of·me and horn of·salvation of·me ¬shielder of·me

4 praising I·will·¬call·myself °lord and out of·the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·me I·will·be·saved

5 they·¬contained °me ¬labors⁺ of·death and ¬winter-flows⁺ of·¬lawlessness they·¬disturbed·greatly °me

6 ¬labors⁺ of·¬hell they·¬surrounded °me they·¬came·before °me ¬traps⁺ of·death

7 and in to·the·one to·self-¬press·on °me I·¬called·myself °the ⁼lord and unto °the ⁼God of·me I·cried heard out of·temple ⁼holy of·him of·voice of·me and the ⁼cry of·me in·the·eye of·him will·come·to·himself to °the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·him

8 and was·¬shaken and ¬trembling was·been·generated the ⁼earth and °the⁺ ⁼foundations⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ they·were·¬troubled and they·were·¬shaken ¬that was·enraged to·them the ⁼God

9 ascended ¬smoke in to·raging of·him and fire off of·face of·him ¬??? ¬charcoals⁺ they·were·¬set·fire off of·him

10 and ¬bowed °heaven and descended and ¬darkness ¬by °the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·him

11 and ¬mounted upon °¬Cherubs⁺ and was·¬spread·out was·¬spread·out upon of·wings⁺ of·¬winds⁺

12 and put·himself °darkness °¬concealment of·him encircling of·him the ⁼dwelling of·him dark ⁼water in to·clouds⁺ of·airs⁺

13 off of·the ⁼¬radiance in·the·eye of·him the⁺ ⁼clouds⁺ they·¬passed·through ¬hail and ¬charcoals⁺ fire

14 and ¬thundered out of·heaven lord and the ⁼Upmost gave °voice of·him

15 and ¬sended·out °¬arrows⁺ and ¬scattered °them and °¬lightnings⁺ multiplied and ¬disturbed °them

16 and they·were·seen the⁺ ⁼wells⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼waters⁺ and was·¬unveiled °the⁺ ⁼foundations⁺ of·the ⁼¬world off of·¬reproach of·you lord off of·¬blasting of·breath of·raging of·you

17 ¬sended·out out of·upwardness and took °me ¬took·himself °me out of·waters⁺ ⁼many⁺

18 will·¬rescue·himself °me out of·enemies⁺ of·me of·potential⁺ and out of·the⁺ ⁼¬hating °me ¬that they·were·¬strengthened over °me*

19 they·¬came·before °me in to·day of·¬oppression of·me and was·generated·himself lord ¬support of·me

20 and brought·out °me to °broadplace will·¬rescue·himself °me ¬that willed °me will·¬rescue·himself °me out of·enemies⁺ of·me of·potential⁺ and out of·the⁺ ⁼¬hating °me

21 and will·¬repay to·me lord ¬by °the ⁼justice of·me and ¬by °the ⁼cleanness of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·me will·¬repay to·me

22 ¬that I·kept °the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·lord and not I·was·irreverent off of·the ⁼God of·me

23 ¬that all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼judgments⁺ of·him in·the·eye of·me and °the⁺ ⁼just·deeds⁺ of·him not I·¬left off myˊ

24 and I·will·be·myself ¬blameless with of·him and I·will·keep·myself off of·the ⁼¬lawlessness of·me

25 and will·¬repay to·me lord ¬by °the ⁼justice of·me and ¬by °the ⁼cleanness of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·me in·the·eye of·the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·him

26 with of·sacred you·will·be·consecrated and with of·man ⁼¬innocent ¬innocent you·will·be·yourself

27 and with of·¬select ¬select you·will·be·yourself and with of·¬crooked you·will·¬pervert

28 ¬that you °people ⁼¬lowly you·will·save and °eyes⁺ of·¬arrogant⁺ you·will·¬humble

29 ¬that you you·will·light °¬lamp of·me lord the ⁼God of·me you·will·light °the ⁼darkness of·me

30 ¬that in to·you I·will·be·¬rescued off of·pirate·band and in to·the ⁼God of·me I·will·¬wrong·myself °wall

31 the ⁼God of·me ¬blameless the ⁼path of·him the⁺ ⁼¬oracleses⁺ of·lord having·been·¬burned ¬defender is of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼hoping upon °him

32 ¬that what ⁼God ¬but of·the ⁼lord and what ⁼God ¬but of·the ⁼God of·us

33 the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼¬girding °me °power and put·himself °¬blameless °the ⁼path of·me

34 the ⁼self-¬completing °the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·me as of·¬hind and upon °the⁺ ⁼upward⁺ standing °me

35 teaching °hands⁺ of·me to °war and you·put·yourself °¬bow ⁼copper °the⁺ ⁼arms⁺ of·me

36 and you·gave to·me °¬shielding of·salvation of·me and the ⁼right of·you ¬helped·himself of·me and the ⁼¬discipline of·you ¬restored °me to °completion and the ⁼¬discipline of·you she °me will·teach

37 you·broadened °the⁺ ⁼¬footsteps⁺ of·me ¬under of·me and not they·were·infirm the⁺ ⁼¬tracks⁺ of·me

38 I·will·¬seek °the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·me and I·will·¬grasp·myself °them and not I·will·be·¬turned·away till iᵮ they·should·¬fail

39 I·will·¬squeeze·out °them and not ńot they·should·have·power·themselves to·stand they·will·¬collapse·themselves ¬by °the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·me

40 and you·¬girded °me °power to °war you·¬bound·hand·and·foot °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬rebelled·against upon °me* ¬under of·me

41 and °the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·me you·gave to·me °spine and °the⁺ ⁼¬hating °me you·destroyed

42 they·cried and not was the ⁼saving unto °lord and not listened·to of·them

43 and I·will·¬make·fine °them as °dust ¬by °face of·¬wind as °¬clay of·broadway⁺ I·will·¬grind °them

44 you·will·¬rescue·yourself °me out of·¬disputes⁺ of·people you·will·¬appoint °me to °head of·nations⁺ people °which not I·knew served to·me

45 to °hearsay of·ear ¬obeyed to·me sons⁺ ⁼¬another's⁺ they·lay·themselves to·me

46 sons⁺ ⁼¬another's⁺ they·were·¬getted·old and they·¬were·lame off of·the·ones⁺ of·¬paths⁺ of·them

47 lives lord and ¬praiseworthy ⁼the ⁼God of·me and ꜝlet·be·upped the ⁼God of·the ⁼salvation of·me

48 the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼giving ¬vengeances⁺ to·me* and ¬subjecting °peoples⁺ ¬by °me*

49 the ⁼¬rescuer of·me out of·enemies⁺ of·me of·¬quick-tempered⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬rebelled·against upon °me* you·will·up °me off of·man ⁼¬unjust you·will·¬rescue·yourself °me

50 through °this I·will·¬agree·myself to·you in to·nations⁺ lord and to·the ⁼name of·you I·will·psalm

51 ¬greatening °the⁺ ⁼salvations⁺ of·the ⁼king of·him and doing °mercy to·the ⁼Christ of·him to·the ⁼David and to·the ⁼seed of·him till of·eternity

Psalm 18

1 to °the ⁼completion psalm to·the ⁼David

2 the⁺ ⁼heavens⁺ they·¬relate·fully·themselves °glory of·God °¬do then of·hands⁺ of·him ¬announces the ⁼¬firmness

3 day to·the ⁼day ¬utters·himself °¬declaration and night to·night ¬announces °knowledge

4 not they·are ¬speeches⁺ not·then sayings⁺ of·which⁺ ¬not! they·hear·themselves the⁺ ⁼voices⁺ of·them

5 to °all ⁼the ⁼earth came·out the ⁼¬sound of·them and to °the⁺ ⁼¬ends⁺ of·the ⁼¬world the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ of·them in to·the ⁼sun put·himself °the ⁼dwelling of·him

6 and he as bridegroom ⁼self-going·out out of·¬nuptial·chamber of·him will·¬rejoice·himself as ¬giant to·¬run °path of·him

7 off of·¬end ⁼the ⁼heaven the ⁼¬departure of·him and the ⁼¬arrival of·him till of·¬end ⁼the ⁼heaven and not is which will·be·¬concealed °the·one ¬??? of·him

8 the ⁼law of·the ⁼lord ¬blameless ⁼¬turning °souls⁺ the ⁼witness of·lord ¬faithful ⁼¬making·wise °¬infant⁺

9 the⁺ ⁼just·deeds⁺ of·lord ¬straight ¬celebrating °heart the ⁼commandment of·lord ¬radiant ⁼lighting °eyes⁺

10 the ⁼fear of·lord pure ⁼¬remaining to °eternity of·eternity the⁺ ⁼judgments⁺ of·lord ¬true⁺ ⁼having·been·justified upon °the °it

11 ¬desirable⁺ over °gold and °stone ⁼¬precious ⁼much and ¬sweet⁺ over °honey and °¬honeycomb

12 for and the ⁼servant of·you keeps °them in to·the·one to·keep °them ¬reward ⁼much

13 ¬trespasses⁺ what will·¬understand out of·the⁺ ⁼¬private⁺ of·me ꜝcleanse °me

14 and off of·¬another's⁺ ꜝ¬spare·yourself of·the ⁼servant of·you ifᵮ ńot of·me they·should·¬master ŧhen ¬blameless I·will·be·myself and I·will·be·cleansed off of·sin ⁼great

15 and they·will·be·themselves to °¬goodwill the⁺ ⁼¬oracleses⁺ of·the ⁼mouth of·me and the ⁼¬meditation of·the ⁼heart of·me in·the·eye of·you through of·all lord ⁼¬helper of·me and ¬redeemer of·me

Psalm 19

1 to °the ⁼completion psalm to·the ⁼David

2 ꜝ¬listen·to·yourself of·you lord in to·day of·¬pressure ꜝ¬shield·yourself of·you °the ⁼name of·the ⁼God ⁼Ya‘aqob

3 to·¬send·out to·you °¬help out of·holy and out of·¬Zion may·¬help·himself of·you

4 may·be·memoried of·all ⁼¬sacrifice of·you and °the ⁼¬burnt·offering of·you ꜝlet·¬fatten ¬pause

5 may·give to·you ¬by °the ⁼heart of·you and °all ⁼the ⁼counsel of·you ꜝfulfill·yourself

6 we·will·¬rejoice·ourselves in to·the ⁼salvation of·you and in to·name of·God of·us we·will·be·¬greatened ꜝfulfill·yourself lord °all °the⁺ ⁼requests⁺ of·you

7 now I·knew ¬that saved lord °the ⁼Christ of·him will·¬listen·to·himself of·him out of·heaven ⁼holy of·him in to·¬commands⁺ the ⁼salvation of·the ⁼right of·him

8 these⁺ in to·¬chariots⁺ and these⁺ in to·horses⁺ we then in to·name of·lord ⁼God of·us we·will·be·¬greatened

9 they they·were·¬bound·hand·and·foot and they·¬collapsed we then we·stood·uꝑ and we·were·¬restored

10 lord ꜝsave °the ⁼king of·you and ꜝ¬listen·to of·us in to·which iᵮ to·day we·should·¬call·ourselves °you

Psalm 20

1 to °the ⁼completion psalm to·the ⁼David

2 lord in to·the ⁼power of·you will·be·¬celebrated the ⁼king and upon to·the ⁼salvation of·you will·¬rejoice·himself very

3 °the ⁼¬desire of·the ⁼soul of·him you·gave to·him and °the ⁼¬will of·the⁺ ⁼lips⁺ of·him not you·¬strengthened °him ¬pause

4 ¬that you·¬came·before °him in to·¬praises⁺ of·¬kindness you·put upon °the ⁼head of·him °crown out of·stone ⁼¬precious

5 °life requested·himself °you and you·gave to·him °¬duration of·days⁺ to °eternity of·eternity

6 great ⁼the ⁼glory of·him in to·the ⁼salvation of·you °glory and °¬majesty you·will·¬put upon °him

7 ¬that you·will·give to·him °¬praise to °eternity of·eternity you·will·¬celebrate °him in to·¬joy with of·the ⁼face of·you

8 ¬that the ⁼king hopes upon °lord and in to·the ⁼mercy of·the ⁼Upmost not ńot should·be·¬shaken

9 may·be·found the ⁼hand of·you to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·you the ⁼right of·you may·find °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬hating °you

10 you·will·put °them as °¬oven of·fire to °¬time of·the ⁼face of·you lord in to·raging of·him will·¬disturb °them and will·¬devour·himself °them fire

11 °the ⁼fruit of·them off of·earth you·will·destroy and °the ⁼seed of·them off of·sons⁺ ⁼humans⁺

12 ¬that they·¬bowed to °you bad⁺ they·¬discussed·themselves °counsel ⁼which not ńot they·should·have·power·themselves to·stand

13 ¬that you·will·put °them °spine in to·the⁺ ⁼¬residue⁺ of·you you·will·prepare °the ⁼face of·them

14 ꜝbe·upped lord in to·the ⁼power of·you we·will·sing·ourselves and we·will·psalm °the⁺ ⁼¬commands⁺ of·you

Psalm 21

1 to °the ⁼completion over of·the ⁼¬help ⁼the ⁼¬early··morning psalm to·the ⁼David

2 the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼God of·me ꜝ¬watch·out to·me so·that °what you·left·out °me ¬far off of·the ⁼salvation of·me the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬trespasses⁺ of·me

3 the ⁼God of·me I·will·cry·myself of·day and not should·listen·to and of·night and not to °¬folly to·me*

4 you then in to·holy⁺ you·house·down the ⁼¬praise of·Yisra’el

5 upon to·you they·hoped the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·us they·hoped and you·¬rescued·yourself °them

6 unto °you they·cried and they·were·saved upon to·you they·hoped and not they·were·¬dishonored

7 I* then I·am ¬worm and not human ¬reproach of·human and ¬??? of·people

8 all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬seeing °me they·¬ridiculed °me they·spoke in to·lips⁺ they·¬moved °head

9 hoped upon °lord ꜝlet·¬rescue·himself °him ꜝlet·save °him ¬that wills °him

10 ¬that you you·are the ⁼¬pulling·out °me out of·womb the ⁼hope of·me off of·¬breasts⁺ of·the ⁼mother of·me

11 upon °you I·was·¬thrown·on out of·motherhood out of·belly ⁼mother of·me God of·me you·are you

12 ńot you·should·¬leave off myˊ ¬that ¬pressure ¬near ¬that not is the ⁼¬helping

13 they·¬surrounded °me calves⁺ ⁼many⁺ ⁼¬bulls⁺ ⁼¬plenty⁺ they·¬contained °me

14 they·¬opened upon °me* °the ⁼mouth of·them as lion ⁼the ⁼¬seizing and self-¬roaring

15 ¬like water I·was·poured·out and was·¬scattered all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·me was·been·generated the ⁼heart of·me ¬like ¬beeswax ⁼self-¬melting in to·middle of·the ⁼belly of·me

16 was·dried·up as ¬potsherd the ⁼strength of·me and the ⁼tongue of·me has·been·¬joined to·the ⁼¬throat of·me and to °dust of·death you·¬brought·down °me

17 ¬that they·encircled °me dogs⁺ ⁼many⁺ ¬synagogue of·self-¬acting·wickedly they·¬contained °me they·¬dug °hands⁺ of·me and °feet⁺

18 ¬??? °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·me they then they·¬observed and they·¬looked·upon °me

19 they·¬divided·themselves °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·me to·¬selves⁺ and upon °the ⁼cloak of·me they·threw °lot

20 you then lord ńot you·should·¬prolong °the ⁼¬help of·me to °the ⁼¬help of·me ꜝ¬watch·out

21 ꜝ¬rescue·yourself off of·sword °the ⁼soul of·me and out of·hand of·dog °the ⁼¬only·begotten of·me

22 ꜝsave °me out of·mouth of·lion and off of·horns⁺ of·¬unicorns⁺ °the ⁼¬lowliness of·me

23 I·will·¬relate·fully·myself °the ⁼name of·you to·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·me in to·middle of·¬assembly I·will·hymn °you

24 the⁺ ⁼self-fearing °lord ꜝpraise⁺ °him ¬all ⁼the ⁼seed of·Ya‘aqob ꜝglorify⁺ °him ꜝlet·them·be·afraid⁺ °him ¬all ⁼the ⁼seed of·Yisra’el

25 ¬that not ¬was·rejected not·then ¬was·angry to·the ⁼¬petition of·the ⁼poor not·then ¬turned·away °the ⁼face of·him off myˊ and in to·the·one to·have·cried °me unto °him listened·to of·me

26 ¬from of·you the ⁼¬praise of·me in to·¬assembly ⁼great °the⁺ ⁼prayers⁺ of·me I·will·¬pay in·the·eye of·the⁺ ⁼self-fearing °him

27 they·will·¬eat·themselves ¬poors⁺ and they·will·be·¬filled·up and they·will·praise °lord the⁺ ⁼seeking·out °him they·will·live·themselves the⁺ ⁼hearts⁺ of·them to °eternity of·eternity

28 they·will·be·memoried and they·will·be·¬turned unto °lord all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬ends⁺ of·the ⁼earth and they·will·worship in·the·eye of·you all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼paternities⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺

29 ¬that of·the ⁼lord the ⁼kingdom and he is·master of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺

30 they·¬ate and they·worshipped all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬plenty⁺ of·the ⁼earth in·the·eye of·him they·will·¬fall·down·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼descending to °the ⁼earth and the ⁼soul of·me to·him lives

31 and the ⁼seed of·me will·serve to·him will·be·¬announced to·the ⁼lord generation ⁼the ⁼self-coming

32 and they·will·¬announce °the ⁼justice of·him to·people ⁼the ⁼going·to·be·enchilded ¬that did the ⁼lord

Psalm 22

1 ⁼psalm to·the ⁼David lord ¬flocksmans °me and no·one °me will·¬lack

2 to °¬place of·green there °me ¬dwelt upon of·water of·¬rest ¬nourished °me

3 °the ⁼soul of·me ¬turned ¬guided °me upon °¬paths⁺ of·justice ¬because·of of·the ⁼name of·him

4 for ifᵮ and I·should·be·gone in to·middle of·shadow of·death not I·will·be·afraid °bad⁺ ¬that you with myˊ you·are the ⁼staff of·you and the ⁼¬staff of·you they °me they·¬pleaded

5 you·prepared in·the·eye of·me °¬table out of·¬hostile of·the⁺ ⁼¬pressing·on °me you·¬anointed in to·¬olive·oil °the ⁼head of·me and the ⁼drinkcup of·you ¬getting·drunk as ¬stronger

6 and the ⁼mercy of·you will·¬seek·himself °me °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the ⁼life of·me and °the·one to·house·down °me in to·house of·lord to °¬duration of·days⁺

Psalm 23

1 psalm to·the ⁼David of·the ⁼one of·shabbats⁺ of·the ⁼lord the ⁼earth and the ⁼¬fulfillment of·her the ⁼¬world and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼housing·down in to·her

2 he upon of·seas⁺ founded °her and upon of·rivers⁺ prepared °her

3 what will·ascend·himself to °the ⁼mountain of·the ⁼lord and what will·stand·himself in to·¬place ⁼holy of·him

4 ¬innocent to·hands⁺ and clean to·the ⁼heart which not took upon to·vain °the ⁼soul of·him and not swore upon to·¬deceit ⁼the ⁼¬neighbor of·him

5 this will·take·himself °¬praise ¬from of·lord and °¬charity ¬from of·God ⁼savior of·him

6 this ⁼the ⁼generation of·seeking °him of·seeking °the ⁼face of·the ⁼God ⁼Ya‘aqob ¬pause

Psalm 24

1 psalm to·the ⁼David unto °you lord I·¬took·up °the ⁼soul of·me the ⁼God of·me

2 upon to·you I·have·¬persuaded ńot may·I·be·¬dishonored ńot·then ꜝlet·them·¬mock⁺ of·me the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·me

3 for and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬remaining °you not ńot they·should·be·¬dishonored ꜝlet·them·be·¬been·ashamed⁺ all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬acting·lawlessly through of·empty

4 °the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·you lord ꜝmake·known to·me and °the⁺ ⁼¬paths⁺ of·you ꜝteach °me

5 ꜝ¬guide °me upon °the ⁼¬truth of·you and ꜝteach °me ¬that you you·are the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼savior of·me and °you I·¬remained °the ⁼whole ⁼day

6 ꜝbe·memoried of·the⁺ ⁼¬compassions⁺ of·you lord and °the⁺ ⁼mercies⁺ of·you ¬that off of·the ⁼eternity they·are

7 of·sin ⁼youth of·me and of·¬ignorance of·me ńot you·should·be·memoried ¬by °the ⁼mercy of·you ꜝbe·memoried of·me you ¬because·of of·the ⁼¬kindness of·you lord

8 ¬good and ¬right ⁼the ⁼lord through °this will·¬give·laws °sinning in to·path

9 will·¬guide °¬gentle⁺ in to·judgment will·teach °¬gentle⁺ °paths⁺ of·him

10 all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·lord mercy and ¬truth to·the⁺ ⁼seeking·out °the ⁼¬covenant of·him and °the⁺ ⁼witnesses⁺ of·him

11 ¬because·of of·the ⁼name of·you lord and you·will·calm·yourself to·the ⁼sin of·me for much is

12 what is human ⁼the ⁼self-fearing °the ⁼lord will·¬give·laws to·him in to·path ⁼which ¬chose·himself

13 the ⁼soul of·him in to·good⁺ will·be·¬spended·the·night and the ⁼seed of·him will·¬inherit °earth

14 ¬fortification lord of·the⁺ ⁼self-fearing °him and the ⁼name of·lord of·the⁺ ⁼self-fearing °him and the ⁼¬covenant of·him of·the·one to·¬make·clear to·them

15 the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·me through of·all unto °the ⁼lord ¬that he will·¬pull·out out of·¬trap °the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·me

16 ꜝ¬look·upon upon °me* and ꜝ¬have·mercy °me ¬that ¬only·begotten and poor I·am I*

17 the⁺ ⁼¬pressures⁺ of·the ⁼heart of·me they·were·broadened out of·the⁺ ⁼¬necessities⁺ of·me ꜝbring·out °me

18 ꜝsee °the ⁼¬lowliness of·me and °the ⁼labor of·me and ꜝ¬release °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·me

19 ꜝsee °the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·me ¬that they·were·multiplied and ¬hatred ⁼¬unjust they·¬hated °me

20 ꜝkeep °the ⁼soul of·me and ꜝ¬rescue·yourself °me ńot may·I·be·¬dishonored ¬that I·hoped upon °you

21 ¬innocent⁺ and ¬straight⁺ they·¬joined·themselves to·me ¬that I·¬remained °you lord

Psalm 25

1 ⁼the ⁼David ꜝjudge °me lord ¬that I* in to·¬innocence of·me I·was·gone and upon to·the ⁼lord hoping not ńot I·should·be·infirm

2 ꜝ¬test °me lord and ꜝtest °me ꜝ¬burn °the⁺ ⁼kidneys⁺ of·me and °the ⁼heart of·me

3 ¬that the ⁼mercy of·you ¬before of·the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·me is and I·¬pleased in to·the ⁼¬truth of·you

4 not I·¬seated with of·¬council of·vanity and with of·¬breaking·the·law not ńot I·should·come·to

5 I·¬hated °¬assembly of·self-¬acting·wickedly and with of·irreverent⁺ not ńot I·will·¬seat

6 I·will·wash·myself in to·¬innocent⁺ °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·me and I·will·encircle °the ⁼¬altar of·you lord

7 of·the·one to·hear °voice of·praise and to·self-¬relate·fully °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬marvelous⁺ of·you

8 lord I·loved °¬beauty of·house of·you and °¬place of·dwelling of·glory of·you

9 ńot you·should·¬destroy·together with of·irreverent⁺ °the ⁼soul of·me and with of·men⁺ of·bloods⁺ °the ⁼life of·me

10 of·which⁺ in to·hands⁺ ¬lawlessnesses⁺ the ⁼right of·them was·filled of·¬gifts⁺

11 I* then in to·¬innocence of·me I·was·gone ꜝ¬ransom·yourself °me and ꜝ¬have·mercy °me

Psalm 26

1 of·the ⁼David ¬before of·the·one to·be·christened lord ⁼light of·me and savior of·me °what I·will·be·afraid lord ⁼¬defender of·the ⁼life of·me off of·what I·will·¬be·timid

2 in to·the·one to·¬come·near upon °me* °doing·bad of·the·one to·¬eat °the⁺ ⁼fleshes⁺ of·me the⁺ ⁼¬pressing·on °me and the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·me they they·were·infirm and they·¬collapsed

3 ifᵮ should·¬deploy·himself upon °me* ¬barracks not will·be·afraid the ⁼heart of·me ifᵮ should·¬rebel·against upon °me* war in to·this I* I·hope

4 °one I·requested·myself ¬from of·lord °this I·will·seek·out of·the·one to·house·down °me in to·house of·lord °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the ⁼life of·me of·the·one to·¬see °me °the ⁼¬delightfulness of·the ⁼lord and to·self-¬oversee °the ⁼temple of·him

Psalm 27

Psalm 30

1 to °the ⁼completion psalm to·the ⁼David of·¬amazement

2 upon to·you lord I·hoped ńot may·I·be·¬dishonored to °the ⁼eternity in to·the ⁼justice of·you ꜝ¬rescue·yourself °me and ꜝ¬take·out·yourself °me

5 you·will·bring·out °me out of·¬trap ⁼this ⁼which they·hid to·me ¬that you you·are the ⁼¬defender of·me

9 and not you·¬confined °me to °hands⁺ of·enemy you·stood in to·¬wide·country °the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·me

13 I·was·¬forgotten ¬like corpse off of·heart I·was·been·generated ¬like ¬vessel ⁼having·destroyed

14 ¬that I·heard °¬fault of·many⁺ ⁼¬·a·stranger encircling in to·the·one to·be·¬gathered °them ¬together upon °me* of·the·one to·take °the ⁼soul of·me they·counselled·themselves

19 ¬mute⁺ ꜝlet·be·been·generated the⁺ ⁼lips⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬deceitful⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼speaking ¬by of·the ⁼just °¬lawlessness in to·¬pride and to·¬contempt

20 as much ⁼the ⁼multitude of·the ⁼¬kindness of·you lord of·which you·hid to·the⁺ ⁼self-fearing °you you·¬completed·yourself to·the⁺ ⁼hoping upon °you ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼humans⁺

21 you·will·¬hide °them in to·¬concealed of·the ⁼face of·you off of·¬disturbance of·humans⁺ you·will·¬shelter °them in to·dwelling off of·¬dispute of·tongues⁺

Psalm 31

1 to·the ⁼David of·¬understanding blessed⁺ of·which⁺ they·were·¬released the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ and of·which⁺ they·were·¬covered the⁺ ⁼sins⁺

2 blessed ⁼man of·which not ńot should·¬count·himself lord °sin not·then is in to·the ⁼mouth of·him ¬deceit

3 ¬that I·¬was·silent was·¬getted·old the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·me off of·the·one to·cry °me °the ⁼whole ⁼day

4 ¬that of·day and of·night was·¬weighed·down upon °me* the ⁼hand of·you I·was·turned to °¬misery in to·the·one to·be·¬sticked·into °¬thorn ¬pause

5 °the ⁼sin of·me I·made·known and °the ⁼¬lawlessness of·me not I·covered I·told I·will·¬confess ¬by myˊ °the ⁼¬lawlessness of·me to·the ⁼lord and you you·¬released °the ⁼irreverence of·the ⁼sin of·me ¬pause

6 over of·this will·pray·himself all ⁼sacred unto °you in to·¬time ⁼¬suitable ¬but in to·¬flood of·waters⁺ ⁼many⁺ unto °him not they·will·¬come·near

7 you of·me you·are ¬refuge off of·¬pressure ⁼the ⁼¬containing °me °the ⁼¬leap·for·joy of·me to·¬ransom °me off of·the⁺ ⁼encircling °me ¬pause

8 I·will·¬bring·understanding·to °you and I·will·¬join·with °you in to·path ⁼this ⁼which should·go I·will·¬strengthen upon °you °the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·me

9 ńot ꜝbe·generated⁺·yourselves⁺ as horse and ¬half-donkey to·which⁺ not is ¬understanding in to·bridle and to·¬muzzle °the⁺ ⁼cheeks⁺ of·them ¬??? of·the·ones⁺ ńot of·¬coming·near unto °you

10 many⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼whips⁺ of·the ⁼sinner then °the ⁼hoping upon °lord mercy will·encircle

11 ꜝbe·¬celebrated⁺ upon °lord and ꜝ¬rejoice⁺·yourselves⁺ just⁺ and ꜝ¬boast⁺·yourselves⁺ all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬straight⁺ to·the ⁼heart

Psalm 32

1 to·the ⁼David ꜝ¬rejoice⁺·yourselves⁺ just⁺ in to·the ⁼lord to·the⁺ ⁼¬straight⁺ ¬is·proper praise

2 ꜝ¬agree⁺·yourselves⁺ to·the ⁼lord in to·guitar in to·¬psaltery ⁼¬ten-stringed ꜝpsalm⁺ to·him

3 ꜝsing⁺ to·him °¬song ⁼new beautifully ꜝpsalm⁺ in to·¬shout

4 ¬that ¬right ⁼the ⁼saying of·the ⁼lord and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·him in to·¬trust

5 loves °¬charity and °judgment of·the ⁼mercy of·lord full the ⁼earth

6 to·the ⁼saying of·the ⁼lord the⁺ ⁼heavens⁺ they·were·¬strengthened and to·the ⁼breath of·the ⁼mouth of·him all ⁼the ⁼power of·them

7 ¬assembling as °¬wineskin °water of·sea putting in to·treasures⁺ °abysss⁺

8 ꜝlet·be·afraid °the ⁼lord all ⁼the ⁼earth off of·him then ꜝlet·them·be·¬shaken⁺ all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼housing·down °the ⁼¬world

9 ¬that he told and they·were·been·generated he commanded·himself and they·were·¬created

10 lord ¬disperses °counsels⁺ of·nations⁺ ¬rejects then °¬thoughts⁺ of·peoples⁺ and ¬rejects °counsels⁺ of·¬leaders⁺

11 then the ⁼counsel of·the ⁼lord to °the ⁼eternity remains ¬thoughts⁺ of·the ⁼heart of·him to °generation and °generation

12 blessed ⁼the ⁼nation of·which is lord ⁼the ⁼God of·him people °which ¬selected·himself to °law-lot to·himself

13 out of·heaven ¬looked·upon the ⁼lord saw °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺

14 out of·prepared ⁼housing-down of·him ¬looked·upon upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼housing·down °the ⁼earth

15 the ⁼shaping ¬by °only⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ of·heart of·them the ⁼¬understanding to °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·them

16 not saves·himself king through °much ⁼power and ¬giant not will·be·saved in to·multitude of·strength of·him

17 lying ⁼horse to °salvation in then to·multitude of·power of·him not will·be·saved

18 ¬¡see! the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·lord upon °the⁺ ⁼self-fearing °him °the⁺ ⁼hoping upon °the ⁼mercy of·him

19 to·self-¬rescue out of·death °the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ of·them and to·¬maintain °them in to·famine

20 the ⁼soul of·us ¬remains to·the ⁼lord ¬that ¬helper and ¬defender of·us is

21 ¬that in to·him will·be·¬celebrated the ⁼heart of·us and in to·the ⁼name ⁼the ⁼holy of·him we·hoped

22 may·be·generated·himself the ⁼mercy of·you lord upon °us ¬just·as we·hoped upon °you

Psalm 33

1 to·the ⁼David ¬when ¬changed °the ⁼face of·him ¬in·front·of Abimelech and ¬released °him and came·off

2 I·will·¬praise °the ⁼lord in to·all ⁼¬time through of·all the ⁼praise of·him in to·the ⁼mouth of·me

3 in to·the ⁼lord will·be·¬praised the ⁼soul of·me ꜝlet·them·hear⁺ ¬gentle⁺ and ꜝlet·them·be·¬celebrated⁺

4 ꜝ¬greaten⁺ °the ⁼lord wiŧh to·me* and we·should·up °the ⁼name of·him upon °the °it

5 I·sought·out °the ⁼lord and ¬listened·to of·me and out of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬sojournings⁺ of·me ¬rescued·himself °me

8 will·¬insert·against announcer of·lord encircling of·the⁺ ⁼self-fearing °him and will·¬rescue·himself °them

10 ꜝbe·afraid⁺ °the ⁼lord the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·him ¬that not is ¬deficiency to·the⁺ ⁼self-fearing °him

11 rich⁺ they·became·poor and they·hungered then the⁺ ⁼seeking·out °the ⁼lord not they·will·be·¬lacked of·all ⁼good ¬pause

12 ¬come children⁺ ꜝhear⁺ of·me °fear of·lord I·will·teach °you⁺

13 what is human ⁼the ⁼willing °life loving °days⁺ to·see °good⁺

14 ꜝrest °the ⁼tongue of·you off of·bad and °lips⁺ of·you of·the·one ńot to·speak °¬deceit

Psalm 34

1 to·the ⁼David ꜝ¬act·as·judge lord °the⁺ ⁼¬harming °me ꜝwar °the⁺ ⁼warring °me

2 ꜝ¬catch·yourself of·¬armor and of·¬long·shield and ꜝstand·uꝑ to °¬help of·me

3 ꜝpour·out °sword and ꜝ¬confine out of·¬hostile of·the⁺ ⁼¬seeking °me they·told to·the ⁼soul of·me salvation of·you I* I·am

4 ꜝlet·them·be·¬been·ashamed⁺ and ꜝlet·them·be·¬caused·shame⁺ the⁺ ⁼seeking °the ⁼soul of·me ꜝlet·them·be·¬turned·away⁺ to °the·ones⁺ ¬after and ꜝlet·them·be·¬dishonored⁺ the⁺ ⁼self-¬counting to·me °bad⁺

5 ꜝlet·them·be·been·generated⁺ ¬like dust ¬by °face of·¬wind and announcer of·lord ¬squeezing·out °them

6 ꜝlet·be·been·generated the ⁼path of·them darkness and ¬slip and announcer of·lord ¬seeking °them

7 ¬that °¬free·gift they·hid to·me °¬decay of·¬trap of·them vainly they·¬reproached °the ⁼soul of·me

8 ꜝlet·come to·them ¬trap °which not they·know and the ⁼¬trap °which they·hid ꜝlet·¬seize °them and in to·the ⁼¬trap they·will·¬collapse·themselves in to·her

9 then the ⁼soul of·me will·¬rejoice·himself upon to·the ⁼lord will·be·¬delighted upon to·the ⁼salvation of·him

10 all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·me they·will·¬say lord what ⁼¬like to·you self-¬rescuing °poor out of·hand of·¬strong⁺ of·him and °poor and °¬poor off of·the⁺ ⁼¬robbing °him

11 standing·uꝑ ⁼witnesses⁺ ⁼¬unjust⁺ °which⁺ not they·knew they·asked °me

12 they·¬repayed to·me °evil⁺ anti of·beautiful⁺ and °¬childlessness to·the ⁼soul of·me

13 I* then in to·the·one °them to·¬trouble to·me I·¬put·on·myself °¬sackcloth and I·¬humbled in to·fasting °the ⁼soul of·me and the ⁼prayer of·me to °¬bosom of·me will·be·¬turned·away

15 and ¬by myˊ they·were·¬celebrated and they·were·¬assembled they·were·¬assembled upon °me* whips⁺ and not I·knew they·were·¬cut·asunder and not they·were·¬pierced

16 they·tested °me they·were·¬ridiculed °me °¬sneering they·gnashed upon °me* °the⁺ ⁼teeth⁺ of·them

17 lord ¬when? you·will·¬look·upon·yourself ꜝ¬restore °the ⁼soul of·me off of·the ⁼¬evil·actions of·them off of·lions⁺ °the ⁼¬only·begotten of·me

18 I·will·¬agree·myself to·you lord in to·¬assembly ⁼much in to·people ⁼¬weighty I·will·praise °you

19 ńot may·they·be·¬rejoiced·at to·me the⁺ ⁼enemies to·me ¬unjustly the⁺ ⁼¬hating °me °¬free·gift and ¬signifying to·eyes⁺

20 ¬that to·me* ¬on·the·other·hand °peaceful⁺ they·spoke and upon °raging °¬deceits⁺ they·¬discussed·themselves

21 and they·broadened upon °me* °the ⁼mouth of·them they·told ¬well·done ¬well·done they·saw the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·us

Psalm 35

1 to °the ⁼completion to·the ⁼servant of·lord to·the ⁼David

4 the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ of·the·one of·mouth of·him ¬lawlessness and ¬deceit not was·counselled to·¬understand of·the·one to·¬be·better

5 °¬lawlessness ¬discussed·himself upon of·the ⁼bed of·him ¬stood·by to·all ⁼path not to·good then ⁼the ⁼badness not ¬was·angry

Psalm 36

1 of·the ⁼David ńot ꜝ¬make·envious in to·self-¬acting·wickedly ńot·then of·zealousy °the⁺ ⁼doing °the ⁼¬lawlessness

2 ¬that ¬like ¬grass ¬quickly they·will·be·¬caused·to·dry·up and ¬like ¬plants⁺ of·green ¬quickly they·will·¬fall·from·themselves

3 ꜝhope upon °lord and ꜝdo °¬kindness and ꜝ¬dwell °the ⁼earth and you·will·be·¬flocksmaned upon to·the ⁼riches of·her

Psalm 37

1 psalm to·the ⁼David to °¬remembrance about of·shabbat

2 lord ńot to·the ⁼¬wrath of·you you·should·¬rebuke °me ńot·then to·the ⁼raging of·you you·should·¬instruct °me

3 ¬that the⁺ ⁼¬arrows⁺ of·you they·were·¬sticked·into to·me and you·¬strengthened upon °me* °the ⁼hand of·you

4 not is ¬healing in to·the ⁼flesh of·me off of·face of·the ⁼raging of·you not is peace to·the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·me off of·face of·the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·me

5 ¬that the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·me they·¬were·haughty °the ⁼head of·me ¬like °¬burden ⁼¬weighty they·were·¬weighed·down upon °me*

6 they·¬smelled and they·¬rotted the⁺ ⁼¬wounds⁺ of·me off of·face of·the ⁼¬foolishness of·me

9 I·was·done·bad and I·was·¬humbled till very I·¬roared·myself off of·¬groan of·the ⁼heart of·me

10 lord ¬in·front·of of·you all ⁼the ⁼¬desire of·me and the ⁼¬groan of·me off of·you not was·hidden

11 the ⁼heart of·me was·¬troubled left·out °me the ⁼strength of·me and the ⁼light of·the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·me and it not is with myˊ

12 the⁺ ⁼friend⁺ of·me and the⁺ ⁼¬neighbors⁺ of·me out of·¬hostile of·me they·¬came·near and they·stood and the⁺ ⁼¬neighbor⁺ of·me off ¬from·afar they·stood

Psalm 38

1 to °the ⁼completion to·the·one Idithoun song to·the ⁼David

2 I·told I·will·keep °the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·me of·the·one ńot to·sin in to·tongue of·me I·put·myself to·the ⁼mouth of·me °keep in to·the·one to·¬commend °the ⁼sinner ¬in·front·of of·me

3 I·was·¬been·mute and I·was·¬humbled and I·¬was·silent out of·good⁺ and °the ⁼¬pain of·me was·¬restored

4 was·¬warmed the ⁼heart of·me ¬inside of·me and in to·the ⁼¬meditation of·me will·be·¬been·enflamed °fire I·spoke in to·tongue of·me

5 ꜝmake·known to·me lord °the·one ¬end of·me and °the ⁼number of·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·me what is so·that I·should·know °what I·¬lack I*

6 ¬¡see! °¬palms⁺ you·put·yourself °the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·me and the ⁼¬confidence of·me ¬like no·one in·the·eye of·you ¬but °the⁺ ⁼¬all·things⁺ vanity all ⁼human ⁼living ¬pause

7 ¬however in to·icon ¬goes·through·himself human ¬but vainly they·are·¬troubled treasures and not knows to·what will·¬assemble °them

8 and now what the ⁼¬perseverance of·me ¬not! the ⁼lord and the ⁼¬confidence of·me ¬from of·you is

9 off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·me ꜝ¬rescue·yourself °me °¬reproach to·¬foolish you·gave °me

10 I·was·¬been·mute and not I·¬opened °the ⁼mouth of·me ¬that you you·are the ⁼doing °me

11 ꜝ¬leave off myˊ °the⁺ ⁼whips⁺ of·you off of·the ⁼strength ⁼the ⁼hand of·you I* I·¬failed

14 ꜝ¬loosen to·me so·that I·will·¬refresh ¬before of·the·one °me to·come·off and ¬not·any·more ńot I·should·¬possess

Psalm 39

1 to °the ⁼completion to·the ⁼David psalm

2 ⁼¬remaining I·¬remained °the ⁼lord and ¬watched·out to·me and listened·to of·the ⁼¬petition of·me

3 and ¬led °me out of·pit of·¬misery and off of·¬clay of·¬slime and stood upon °rock °the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·me and ¬guided °the⁺ ⁼¬footsteps⁺ of·me

4 and threw·in to °the ⁼mouth of·me °¬song ⁼new °hymn to·the ⁼God of·us they·will·see·themselves many⁺ and they·will·be·afraid and they·will·hope upon °lord

5 blessed ⁼man of·which is the ⁼name of·lord hope of·him and not ¬looked·into to °vanities⁺ and °¬insanities⁺ °lying⁺

6 °many⁺ you·did you lord the ⁼God of·me °the⁺ ⁼¬marvelous⁺ of·you and to·the⁺ ⁼¬reasonings⁺ of·you not is what will·be·¬likened to·you I·¬announced and I·spoke they·were·multiplied over °number

7 °¬sacrifice and °¬offering not you·willed °ears⁺ then you·¬completed·yourself to·me °¬burnt·offering and about of·sin not you·requested

8 ŧhen they·told ¬¡see! you·arrived·yourself in to·header of·booklet has·written·himself about myˊ

9 of·the·one to·do °the ⁼will of·you the ⁼God of·me I·was·counselled and °the ⁼law of·you in to·middle of·the ⁼belly of·me

10 I·¬announced·myself °justice in to·¬assembly ⁼great ¬¡see! °the⁺ ⁼lips⁺ of·me not ńot I·should·¬prevent lord you you·knew

11 °the ⁼justice of·you not I·hid in to·the ⁼heart of·me °the ⁼¬truth of·you and °the ⁼salvation of·you I·told not I·hid °the ⁼mercy of·you and °the ⁼¬truth of·you off of·¬synagogue ⁼much

12 you then lord ńot you·should·¬prolong °the⁺ ⁼¬compassions⁺ of·you off myˊ the ⁼mercy of·you and the ⁼¬truth of·you through of·all they·¬helped·themselves of·me

13 ¬that they·¬contained °me °bad⁺ of·which⁺ not is number they·¬grasped °me the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·me and not I·was·had·power of·the·one to·look·at they·were·multiplied over °the⁺ ⁼hair⁺ of·the ⁼head of·me and the ⁼heart of·me left·out °me

14 ꜝ¬delight lord of·the·one to·self-¬rescue °me lord to °the·one to·¬help to·me ꜝ¬watch·out

18 I* then poor I·am and ¬poor ⁼lord will·¬be·careful of·me ¬helper of·me and ¬defender of·me you you·are the ⁼God of·me ńot you·should·¬delay

Psalm 40

1 to °the ⁼completion psalm to·the ⁼David

Psalm 43

Psalm 44

Psalm 48

1 to °the ⁼completion to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Korah psalm

2 ꜝhear⁺ °these⁺ all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ꜝ¬listen·to⁺·yourselves⁺ all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼housing·down °the ⁼¬world

3 which⁺ also ¬earth-born⁺ and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ upon °the °it rich and ¬poor

4 the ⁼mouth of·me will·speak °wisdom and the ⁼¬meditation of·the ⁼heart of·me °¬understanding

5 I·will·¬bow to °¬parable °the ⁼ear of·me I·will·¬open in to·¬psaltery °the ⁼¬riddle of·me

6 so·that °what I·fear·myself in to·day ⁼evil the ⁼¬lawlessness of·the ⁼heel of·me will·encircle °me

10 and ¬abated to °the ⁼eternity and will·live·himself to °completion ¬that not will·see·himself °¬corruption ¬when should·see °wise⁺ ⁼dying·off

11 upon °the °it ¬foolish and ¬mindless they·will·destroy·themselves and they·will·leave to·¬another's⁺ °the ⁼riches of·them

12 and the⁺ ⁼tombs⁺ of·them houses⁺ of·them to °the ⁼eternity dwellings⁺ of·them to °generation and °generation they·¬called·themselves °the⁺ ⁼names⁺ of·them upon of·the⁺ ⁼¬earths⁺ of·them

13 and human in to·honor being not ¬understanded was·¬resembled to·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬foolish⁺ and was·¬likened to·them

14 this ⁼the ⁼path of·them ¬stumbling·block to·them and with °these⁺ in to·the ⁼mouth of·them they·will·¬delight ¬pause

15 as °sheep⁺ in to·¬hell they·put·themselves death ¬flocksmans °them and they·will·¬master of·them the⁺ ⁼¬straight⁺ °the·one early and the ⁼¬help of·them will·be·¬getted·old in to·the ⁼¬hell out of·the ⁼glory of·them

16 ¬but the ⁼God will·¬ransom·himself °the ⁼soul of·me out of·hand of·¬hell ¬when should·take °me ¬pause

17 ńot ꜝfear·yourself ¬when should·be·enriched human and ¬when should·be·multiplied the ⁼glory of·the ⁼house of·him

19 ¬that the ⁼soul of·him in to·the ⁼life of·him will·be·¬praised will·¬agree·himself to·you ¬when you·should·¬be·better to·him

21 human in to·honor being not ¬understanded was·¬resembled to·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼¬foolish⁺ and was·¬likened to·them

Psalm 49

1 psalm to·the Asaf God of·Gods⁺ lord spoke and called °the ⁼earth off of·¬easts⁺ of·sun and ¬until of·wests⁺

2 out of·¬Zion the ⁼¬beauty of·the ⁼¬beauty of·him the ⁼God ¬visibly will·arrive

3 the ⁼God of·us and not they·will·¬remain·silent·themselves °fire ¬in·front·of of·him will·be·¬kindled and encircling of·him ¬blast very

4 will·¬call·to·himself °the ⁼heaven ¬above and °the ⁼earth to·¬judge °the ⁼people of·him

5 ꜝ¬assemble⁺ to·him °the⁺ ⁼sacred⁺ of·him °the⁺ ⁼self-¬making·a·covenant °the ⁼¬covenant of·him upon to·¬sacrifices⁺

6 and they·will·¬announce the⁺ ⁼heavens⁺ °the ⁼justice of·him ¬that the ⁼God ⁼judge is ¬pause

7 ꜝhear people of·me and I·will·speak to·you Yisra’el and I·¬testify·solemnly·myself to·you the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼God of·you I·am I*

8 not upon to·the⁺ ⁼¬sacrifices⁺ of·you I·will·¬rebuke °you then the⁺ ⁼¬burnt·offerings⁺ of·you in·the·eye of·me is through of·all

9 not I·will·¬receive·myself out of·the ⁼house of·you °calves⁺ not·then out of·the⁺ ⁼¬flocks⁺ of·you °winterlings⁺

10 ¬that my is all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼¬grove ¬animals⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ and ¬oxes⁺

11 I·have·known °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and ¬beauty of·field with myˊ is

12 ifᵮ I·should·hunger not ńot to·you I·should·tell for myˊ is the ⁼¬world and the ⁼¬fulfillment of·her

13 ńot I·will·¬eat·myself °meats⁺ of·¬bulls⁺ or °blood of·¬he-goats⁺ I·will·drink·myself

14 ꜝ¬sacrifice to·the ⁼God °¬sacrifice of·praise and ꜝ¬pay to·the ⁼Upmost °the⁺ ⁼prayers⁺ of·you

Psalm 50

1 to °the ⁼completion psalm to·the ⁼David

2 in to·the·one to·come unto °him ⁼¬Nathan ⁼the ⁼prophet ¬when came·to unto Bērsabee

3 ꜝ¬have·mercy °me the ⁼God ¬by °the ⁼great ⁼mercy of·you and ¬by °the ⁼multitude of·the⁺ ⁼¬compassions⁺ of·you ꜝ¬blot·out °the ⁼¬violation·of·law of·me

18 ¬helper of·me to·you I·will·psalm ¬that the ⁼God ⁼¬shielder of·me you·are the ⁼God of·me the ⁼mercy of·me

Psalm 59

1 to °the ⁼completion to·the⁺ ⁼going·to·be·¬changed still to °¬inscription·on·a·monument to·the ⁼David to °teaching

2 ¬when ¬burned °the ⁼Midriver of·¬Syria and °the ⁼¬Syria Sōba and ¬turned Iōab and struck °the ⁼¬valley of·the⁺ ⁼¬salts⁺ twelve °thousands⁺

3 the ⁼God you·¬rejected·yourself °us and you·¬took·down °us you·were·enraged and you·¬had·compassion °us

4 you·¬shook °the ⁼earth and you·¬disturbed °her ꜝ¬heal·yourself °the⁺ ⁼¬ruins⁺ of·her ¬that was·¬shaken

5 you·showed to·the ⁼people of·you °hard⁺ you·gave·drink °us °wine of·¬stupor

6 you·gave to·the⁺ ⁼self-fearing °you °¬signal of·the·one to·flee off of·face ⁼¬bow ¬pause

7 ¬that iᵮ they·should·be·¬rescued the⁺ ⁼beloved⁺ of·you ꜝsave to·the ⁼right of·you and ꜝ¬listen·to of·me

8 the ⁼God spoke in to·the ⁼holy of·him I·will·¬rejoice·myself and I·will·¬divide °¬portion and °the ⁼¬cavity of·the⁺ ⁼dwellings⁺ I·will·¬measure·out

9 myˊ is Galaad and myˊ is ¬Manasseh and ¬Ephraim ¬fortification of·the ⁼head of·me Yudah ⁼king of·me

10 Mōab ¬kettle of·the ⁼hope of·me upon °the ⁼¬Idumea I·will·¬stretch·out °the ⁼¬sandal of·me to·me* othertribes⁺ they·¬subjected

11 what will·¬lead·away °me to °city of·¬passage what will·¬guide °me till of·the ⁼¬Idumea

12 ¬not! you the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼self-¬rejecting °us and not you·will·come·out·yourself the ⁼God in to·the⁺ ⁼powers⁺ of·us

13 ꜝgive to·us °¬help out of·¬pressure and vain ⁼salvation of·human

14 in then to·the ⁼God we·will·do °power and he will·¬be·rejected °the⁺ ⁼¬pressing·on °us

Psalm 60

1 to °the ⁼completion in to·hymns⁺ to·the ⁼David

2 ꜝlisten·to the ⁼God of·the ⁼¬petition of·me ꜝ¬watch·out to·the ⁼prayer of·me

3 off of·the⁺ ⁼¬ends⁺ of·the ⁼earth unto °you I·cried in to·the·one to·¬be·discouraged °the ⁼heart of·me in to·rock you·upped °me

Psalm 61

1 to °the ⁼completion over Idithoun psalm to·the ⁼David

Psalm 62

1 psalm to·the ⁼David in to·the·one to·be °him in to·the ⁼desert of·the ⁼Yudaea

2 the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼God of·me unto °you I·¬rise·at·dawn thirsted to·you the ⁼soul of·me ¬how·often to·you the ⁼flesh of·me in to·earth ⁼desert and to·¬impassable and to·¬waterless

4 ¬that ¬greater ⁼the ⁼mercy of·you over °lifes⁺ the⁺ ⁼lips⁺ of·me they·will·¬praise °you

5 thus I·will·¬praise °you in to·the ⁼life of·me in to·the ⁼name of·you I·will·¬take·up °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·me

6 ¬like of·fat and of·¬richness may·be·¬filled·up the ⁼soul of·me and lips⁺ of·¬joy will·praise the ⁼mouth of·me

Psalm 68

1 to °the ⁼completion over of·the⁺ ⁼going·to·be·¬changed to·the ⁼David

2 ꜝsave °me the ⁼God ¬that they·came·to °water till of·soul of·me

3 I·was·¬sticked·into to °¬slime of·¬deep and not is ¬confidence I·came to °the⁺ ⁼¬depths⁺ of·the ⁼sea and ¬blast ¬sank °me

4 I·labored crying ¬sored·throat the ⁼¬throat of·me they·¬failed the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·me off of·the·one to·hope upon °the ⁼God of·me

5 they·were·multiplied over °the⁺ ⁼hair⁺ of·the ⁼head of·me the⁺ ⁼¬hating °me ¬freely they·were·grown·mighty the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·me the⁺ ⁼¬persecuting °me ¬unjustly °which⁺ not I·¬seized ŧhen they·¬payed·for

6 the ⁼God you you·knew °the ⁼¬foolishness of·me and the⁺ ⁼¬trespasses⁺ of·me off of·you not they·were·hidden

7 ńot may·they·be·¬been·ashamed upon to·me* the⁺ ⁼¬remaining °you lord ⁼lord of·the⁺ ⁼powers⁺ ńot may·they·be·¬caused·shame upon to·me* the⁺ ⁼seeking °you the ⁼God of·the ⁼Yisra’el

8 ¬that ¬because·of of·you I·¬endured °¬reproach covered ¬shame °the ⁼face of·me

9 having·been·¬alienated I·was·been·generated to·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·me and ¬foreign to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the ⁼mother of·me

10 ¬that the ⁼zealousy of·the ⁼house of·you ¬devoured °me and the⁺ ⁼¬reproaches⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬reproaching °you they·¬fell upon °me*

11 and I·¬bended in to·fasting °the ⁼soul of·me and was·been·generated to °¬reproach to·me*

12 and I·put·myself °the ⁼¬clothing of·me °¬sackcloth and I·was·generated·myself to·them to °¬parable

13 ¬by myˊ they·¬meditated the⁺ ⁼self-¬sitting in to·gate and to °me* they·psalmed the⁺ ⁼drinking °the ⁼wine

14 I* then to·the ⁼prayer of·me unto °you lord ¬time of·¬goodwill the ⁼God in to·the ⁼multitude of·the ⁼mercy of·you ꜝ¬listen·to of·me in to·¬truth of·the ⁼salvation of·you

15 ꜝsave °me off of·¬clay so·that ńot I·should·be·¬sticked·into may·I·be·¬rescued out of·the⁺ ⁼¬hating °me and out of·the ⁼¬depth of·the⁺ ⁼waters⁺

16 ńot °me ꜝlet·¬sink ¬blast of·water ńot·then ꜝlet·drink·down °me ¬deep ńot·then ꜝlet·¬hold upon °me* °cistern the ⁼mouth of·him

17 ꜝlisten·to of·me lord ¬that ¬good ⁼the ⁼mercy of·you ¬by °the ⁼multitude of·the⁺ ⁼¬compassions⁺ of·you ꜝ¬look·upon upon °me*

18 ńot you·should·¬turn·away °the ⁼face of·you off of·the ⁼kid of·you ¬that I·¬press·on·myself ¬quickly ꜝ¬listen·to of·me

19 ꜝ¬watch·out to·the ⁼soul of·me and ꜝ¬ransom·yourself °her ¬because·of of·the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·me ꜝ¬rescue·yourself °me

20 for you you·know °the ⁼¬reproach of·me and °the ⁼¬shame of·me and °the ⁼¬shame of·me ¬in·front·of of·you all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬pressing·on °me

24 ꜝlet·them·be·darkened⁺ the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·them of·the·one ńot to·look·at and °the·one °spine of·them through of·all ꜝ¬bend

25 ꜝpour·out upon °them °the ⁼raging of·you and the ⁼¬wrath of·the ⁼raging of·you may·¬grasp °them

26 ꜝlet·be·been·generated the ⁼¬residence of·them having·been·made·deserted and in to·the⁺ ⁼dwellings⁺ of·them ńot ꜝlet·be the ⁼housing·down

27 ¬that °which you you·struck they they·¬sought and upon °the ⁼¬pain of·the⁺ ⁼trauma-deads⁺ of·you they·¬added

Psalm 69

1 to °the ⁼completion to·the ⁼David to °¬remembrance

Psalm 70

Psalm 76

1 to °the ⁼completion over Idithoun to·the Asaf psalm

14 the ⁼God in to·the ⁼holy the ⁼path of·you what ⁼God ⁼great as the ⁼God of·us

15 you you·are the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼doing °¬marvelous⁺ you·made·known in to·the⁺ ⁼peoples⁺ °the ⁼power of·you

16 you·¬ransomed·yourself in to·the ⁼arm of·you °the ⁼people of·you °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Ya‘aqob and of·Yosef ¬pause

17 they·saw °you °water the ⁼God they·saw °you °water and they·were·afraid and they·were·¬troubled abysss⁺ °multitude °¬sounds⁺ of·waters⁺

18 °voice they·gave the⁺ ⁼clouds⁺ for and °the⁺ ⁼¬arrows⁺ of·you they·¬go·through·themselves

19 voice of·the ⁼¬thunder of·you in to·the ⁼¬course they·¬shined the⁺ ⁼¬lightnings⁺ of·you to·the ⁼¬world was·¬shaken and ¬trembling was·been·generated the ⁼earth

20 in to·the ⁼sea the ⁼path of·you and the⁺ ⁼¬paths⁺ of·you in to·waters⁺ ⁼many⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬tracks⁺ of·you not they·will·be·known

21 you·¬guided as °sheep⁺ °the ⁼people of·you in to·hand of·Mosheh and of·Aharon

Psalm 77

1 of·¬understanding to·the Asaf ꜝ¬watch·out⁺ people of·me °the ⁼law of·me ꜝ¬bow⁺ °the ⁼ear of·you⁺ to °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ of·the ⁼mouth of·me

2 I·will·¬open in to·¬parables⁺ °the ⁼mouth of·me I·will·¬speak·myself °¬riddles⁺ off of·¬beginning

3 °whatever⁺ we·heard and we·knew °them and the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·us they·¬related·fully·themselves to·us

4 not was·hidden off of·the⁺ ⁼children⁺ of·them to °generation ⁼óther ¬announcing °the⁺ ⁼praises⁺ of·the ⁼lord and °the⁺ ⁼¬commands⁺ of·him and °the⁺ ⁼¬marvelous⁺ of·him °which⁺ did

Psalm 78

1 psalm to·the Asaf the ⁼God they·came nations⁺ to °the ⁼law-lot of·you they·defiled °the ⁼temple ⁼the ⁼holy of·you they·put·themselves °Yerushalam to °¬storehouse·of·fruits

2 they·put·themselves °the⁺ ⁼¬decaying·flesh⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼servants⁺ of·you °¬foods⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven °the⁺ ⁼fleshes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sacred⁺ of·you to·the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼earth

3 they·poured·out °the ⁼blood of·them as °water encircling of·Yerushalam and not was the ⁼entombing

4 we·were·been·generated °¬reproach to·the⁺ ⁼¬neighbors⁺ of·us ¬sneering and ¬taunting to·the·ones⁺ encircling of·us

5 till ¬when? lord you·will·be·enraged to °completion will·be·¬been·enflamed as fire the ⁼zealousy of·you

6 ꜝpour·out °the ⁼raging of·you upon °nations⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ńot °knowing °you and upon of·kingdom which⁺ °the ⁼name of·you not they·¬called·themselves

7 ¬that they·¬devoured °the ⁼Ya‘aqob and °the ⁼¬place of·him they·made·deserted

8 ńot you·should·be·memoried of·us of·¬lawlessnesses⁺ ⁼¬ancient⁺ ¬quickly ꜝlet·them·¬be·first·to·take⁺ °us the⁺ ⁼¬compassions⁺ of·you ¬that we·became·poor very

9 ꜝ¬help to·us the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼savior of·us ¬because·of of·the ⁼glory of·the ⁼name of·you lord ꜝ¬rescue·yourself °us and you·should·be·calmed to·the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·us ¬because·of of·the ⁼name of·you

10 ¬lest they·should·tell the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ¬where? is the ⁼God of·them and ꜝlet·be·known in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ in·the·eye of·the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·us the ⁼¬vengeance of·the ⁼blood of·the⁺ ⁼servants⁺ of·you of·the ⁼having·self-poured·out

11 ꜝlet·come·to in·the·eye of·you the ⁼¬groan of·the⁺ ⁼having·been·¬shackled ¬by °the ⁼¬greatness of·the ⁼arm of·you ꜝ¬gain·yourself °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼having·been·put·to·death

Psalm 80

1 to °the ⁼completion over of·the⁺ ⁼¬winepresses⁺ to·the Asaf psalm

2 ꜝ¬rejoice⁺·yourselves⁺ to·the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼¬helper of·us ꜝ¬wail⁺ to·the ⁼God of·Ya‘aqob

4 ꜝtrumpet⁺ in to·young·moon ⁼trumpet in to·¬intelligible ⁼day of·feast of·us

5 ¬that order to·the ⁼Yisra’el is and judgment to·the ⁼God ⁼Ya‘aqob

6 °witness in to·the ⁼Yosef put·himself °him in to·the·one to·come·out °him out of·earth ⁼Egypt °tongue ⁼which not knew heard

7 ¬left off of·¬loads⁺ °the·one °spine of·him the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·him in to·the ⁼¬basket they·served

Psalm 81

1 psalm to·the Asaf the ⁼God stood in to·¬synagogue of·Gods⁺ in to·middle then °Gods⁺ ¬judges

2 till ¬when? you⁺·judge °¬unrighteousness and °faces⁺ of·sinner⁺ you⁺·take ¬pause

3 ꜝjudge⁺ °orphan and °poor ⁼¬lowly and °¬poor ꜝjustify⁺

Psalm 82

1 song of·psalm to·the Asaf

2 the ⁼God ⁼what will·be·¬likened to·you ńot you·should·¬be·silent ńot·then you·should·¬soothe the ⁼God

3 ¬that ¬¡see! the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·you they·¬resounded and the⁺ ⁼¬hating °you they·¬took·up °head

4 upon °the ⁼people of·you they·¬dealed·treacherously·themselves °¬resolution and they·counselled·themselves ¬by of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·you

5 they·told ¬come and we·should·destroy °them out of·nation and not ńot should·be·memoried °the ⁼name of·Yisra’el still

6 ¬that they·counselled·themselves in to·¬concord upon °the °it ¬by of·you °¬covenant they·¬made·a·covenant·themselves

7 the⁺ ⁼dwellings⁺ of·the⁺ Idoumaiōn and the⁺ Ismaēlitai Mōab and the⁺ ⁼Hagars⁺

8 Gebal and Ammōn and Amalēk and othertribes⁺ with of·the⁺ ⁼housing·down °¬Tyre

9 for and and Assour ¬assembled·himself with of·them they·were·been·generated to °¬help to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Lot ¬pause

10 ꜝdo to·them as to·the ⁼¬Midian and to·the Sisara as the Iabin in to·the ⁼¬winter-flow Kisōn

11 they·were·destroyed in Aendōr they·were·been·generated ¬like dung to·the ⁼earth

12 ꜝput·yourself °the⁺ ⁼¬leaders⁺ of·them as °the Ōrēb and Zēb and Zebee and Salmana °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬leaders⁺ of·them

13 whos⁺ they·told we·should·¬inherit to·¬selves⁺ °the ⁼¬holy·place of·the ⁼God

14 the ⁼God of·me ꜝput·yourself °them as °¬course as °¬straw ¬by °face of·¬wind

15 ¬like °fire ⁼which will·¬burn·up °¬grove as if ¬flame to·¬burn °mountains⁺

16 thus you·will·¬seek °them in to·the ⁼¬blast of·you and in to·the ⁼raging of·you you·will·¬trouble °them

17 ꜝfulfill °the⁺ ⁼faces⁺ of·them of·¬dishonour and they·will·seek °the ⁼name of·you lord

18 ꜝlet·them·be·¬been·ashamed⁺ and ꜝlet·them·be·¬troubled⁺ to °the ⁼eternity of·the ⁼eternity and ꜝlet·them·be·¬caused·shame⁺ and ꜝlet·them·destroy⁺·themselves

19 and ꜝlet·them·know⁺ ¬that °name to·you lord you only ⁼Upmost upon °all ⁼the ⁼earth

Psalm 83

1 to °the ⁼completion over of·the⁺ ⁼¬winepresses⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Korah psalm

2 as beloved⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼dwellings⁺ of·you lord of·the⁺ ⁼powers⁺

3 ¬longs·for and ¬fails the ⁼soul of·me to °the⁺ ⁼¬palaces⁺ of·the ⁼lord the ⁼heart of·me and the ⁼flesh of·me they·¬rejoiced·themselves upon °God ⁼living

4 for and ¬sparrow found to·himself °house and pigeon °¬chick to·¬self of·which will·put °the⁺ ⁼¬chicks⁺ of·her °the⁺ ⁼¬altars⁺ of·you lord of·the⁺ ⁼powers⁺ the ⁼king of·me and the ⁼God of·me

5 blessed⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼housing·down in to·the ⁼house of·you to °the⁺ ⁼eternities⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼eternities⁺ they·will·praise °you ¬pause

6 blessed ⁼man of·which is the ⁼¬help of·him ¬from of·you lord ascents⁺ in to·the ⁼heart of·him ¬made·a·covenant·himself

7 in to·the ⁼¬cavity of·the ⁼¬place·of·weeping to °¬place ⁼which put·himself for and of·¬praise will·give the ⁼¬giving·laws

8 they·will·go·themselves out of·power to °power will·be·seen the ⁼God of·the⁺ ⁼Gods⁺ in to·¬Zion
