Psalm 92

1 to °the ⁼day of·the ⁼¬Friday when has·been·housed·down the ⁼earth praise of·song to·the ⁼David the ⁼lord became·king °¬beauty ¬put·on·himself ¬put·on·himself lord °power and ¬girded·himself for and ¬strengthened °the ⁼¬world who not will·be·¬shaken

2 prepared ⁼the ⁼throne of·you off ŧhen off of·the ⁼eternity you you·are

3 they·¬lifted·up the⁺ ⁼rivers⁺ lord they·¬lifted·up the⁺ ⁼rivers⁺ °voices⁺ of·them

4 off of·voices⁺ of·waters⁺ ⁼many⁺ ¬marvellous⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬crests⁺ of·the ⁼sea ¬marvellous in to·upward⁺ the ⁼lord

5 the⁺ ⁼witnesses⁺ of·you ꜝlet·them·be·¬been·convinced⁺ very to·the ⁼house of·you ¬is·proper °holiness lord to °¬duration of·days⁺

Psalm 93

1 psalm to·the ⁼David to·four of·shabbats⁺ the ⁼God of·¬vengeances⁺ lord ⁼the ⁼God of·¬vengeances⁺ ¬preached·boldly·himself

2 ꜝbe·upped the ⁼judging °the ⁼earth ꜝ¬pay °¬reward to·the⁺ ⁼¬arrogant⁺

3 till ¬when? sinner⁺ lord till ¬when? sinner⁺ they·will·¬boast·themselves

4 they·will·¬speak·themselves and they·will·speak °¬unrighteousness they·will·speak all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-working °the ⁼¬lawlessness

5 °the ⁼people of·you lord they·¬humbled and °the ⁼law-lot of·you they·did·bad

6 °widow and °¬proselyte they·killed·off and °orphan⁺ they·murdered

7 and they·told not will·see·himself lord not·then will·¬understand the ⁼God of·the ⁼Ya‘aqob

8 ꜝ¬understand⁺ ¬so ¬foolish⁺ in to·the ⁼people and ¬foolish⁺ ¬once ꜝ¬reason⁺

9 the ⁼¬planting °the ⁼ear ¬not! hears or the ⁼shaping °the ⁼eye not ¬observes

10 the ⁼¬instructing °nations⁺ ¬not! will·¬rebuke the ⁼teaching °human °knowledge

11 lord knows °the⁺ ⁼¬reasonings⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ¬that they·are vain⁺

12 blessed ⁼human °which iᵮ you you·should·¬instruct lord and out of·the ⁼law of·you you·should·teach °him

13 of·the·one to·¬calm to·him off of·days⁺ ⁼evil⁺ till of·which was·¬dug to·the ⁼sinner ¬cesspool

14 ¬that not will·¬reject·himself lord °the ⁼people of·him and °the ⁼law-lot of·him not will·leave·out

15 till of·which justice you·will·¬turn·yourself to °judgment and self-having of·her all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬straight⁺ to·the ⁼heart ¬pause

16 what will·stand·uꝑ·himself to·me upon ¬??? or what will·¬stand·up·with·himself to·me upon °self-working °the ⁼¬lawlessness

17 if ńot ¬that lord ¬helped to·me ¬from °¬little ¬was·a·stranger to·the ⁼¬hell the ⁼soul of·me

18 if I·said has·been·¬shaken the ⁼foot of·me the ⁼mercy of·you lord ¬helps to·me

19 lord ¬by °the ⁼multitude of·the⁺ ⁼¬anguishes⁺ of·me in to·the ⁼heart of·me the⁺ ⁼¬encouragements⁺ of·you they·loved °the ⁼soul of·me

20 ńot will·¬adhere·with·himself to·you throne of·¬lawlessness the ⁼shaping °labor upon to·order

21 they·will·¬hunt upon °soul of·just and °blood ⁼¬innocent they·will·¬condemn·themselves

22 and was·generated·himself to·me lord to °¬refuge and the ⁼God of·me to °¬helper of·hope of·me

23 and will·¬pay to·them °the ⁼¬lawlessness of·them and ¬by °the ⁼evil of·them will·¬destroy °them lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us

Psalm 94

1 praise of·song to·the ⁼David ¬come we·should·¬rejoice·ourselves to·the ⁼lord we·should·¬wail to·the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼savior of·us

2 I·should·¬come·before °the ⁼face of·him in to·¬acknowledgment and in to·psalms⁺ we·should·¬wail to·him

3 ¬that God ⁼great ⁼lord and king ⁼great upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼Gods⁺

4 ¬that in to·the ⁼hand of·him the·ones⁺ ¬end of·the ⁼earth and the⁺ ⁼upwardnesses⁺ of·the·ones⁺ of·mountains⁺ of·him they·are

5 ¬that of·him is the ⁼sea and he did °her and °the ⁼dry the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·him they·shaped

6 ¬come we·should·worship and we·should·¬fall to·him and we·should·¬weep ¬in·front·of of·lord ⁼the ⁼doing °us

7 ¬that he is the ⁼God of·us and we people of·¬pasture of·him and °sheep⁺ of·hand of·him today ifᵮ of·the ⁼voice of·him you⁺·should·hear

8 ńot you⁺·should·harden °the⁺ ⁼hearts⁺ of·you⁺ as in to·the ⁼¬rebellion ¬by °the ⁼day of·the ⁼testing in to·the ⁼desert

9 of·which they·tested the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ they·¬tested and they·saw °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·me

10 forty °years⁺ I·¬was·angry to·the ⁼generation ⁼that and I·told eternally they·lead·wandering·themselves to·the ⁼heart and they not they·knew °the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·me

11 as I·swore in to·the ⁼raging of·me if they·will·come·to·themselves to °the ⁼¬rest of·me

Psalm 95

1 when the ⁼house housebuilt·himself with °the ⁼battlechained song to·the ⁼David ꜝsing⁺ to·the ⁼lord °¬song ⁼new ꜝsing⁺ to·the ⁼lord all ⁼the ⁼earth

2 ꜝsing⁺ to·the ⁼lord ꜝ¬praise⁺ °the ⁼name of·him ꜝ¬announce⁺·yourselves⁺ °day out of·day °the ⁼salvation of·him

3 ꜝ¬announce⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ °the ⁼glory of·him in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼peoples⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬marvelous⁺ of·him

4 ¬that great ⁼lord and ¬praiseworthy very ¬fearful is upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼Gods⁺

5 ¬that all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼Gods⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ demons⁺ then the ⁼lord °the⁺ ⁼heavens⁺ did

6 ¬acknowledgment and ¬beauty in·the·eye of·him holiness and ¬majesty in to·the ⁼holiness of·him

7 ꜝbear⁺ to·the ⁼lord the⁺ ⁼paternities⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ꜝbear⁺ to·the ⁼lord °glory and °honor

8 ꜝbear⁺ to·the ⁼lord °glory to·name of·him ꜝ¬take·up⁺ °¬sacrifices⁺ and you⁺·¬enter·yourselves⁺ to °the⁺ ⁼¬palaces⁺ of·him

9 ꜝworship⁺ to·the ⁼lord in to·¬palace ⁼holy of·him ꜝlet·be·¬shaken off of·face of·him all ⁼the ⁼earth

10 you⁺·told in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ the ⁼lord became·king for and ¬kept·straight °the ⁼¬world who not will·be·¬shaken will·judge °peoples⁺ in to·¬righteousness

11 ꜝlet·them·¬celebrate⁺·themselves the⁺ ⁼heavens⁺ and ꜝlet·¬rejoice·himself the ⁼earth ꜝlet·be·¬shaken the ⁼sea and °the ⁼¬fulfillment of·her

12 will·be·¬rejoiced the⁺ ⁼plains⁺ and all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ in to·them ŧhen they·will·¬rejoice·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ of·the ⁼¬grove

13 ¬before of·face of·lord ¬that comes·himself ¬that comes·himself to·judge °the ⁼earth will·judge °the ⁼¬world in to·justice and °peoples⁺ in to·the ⁼¬truth of·him

Psalm 96

1 to·the ⁼David when the ⁼earth of·him will·be·¬appointed the ⁼lord became·king ꜝlet·¬rejoice·himself the ⁼earth ꜝlet·them·be·¬celebrated⁺ islands⁺ ⁼many⁺

2 cloud and ¬darkness encircling of·him justice and judgment ¬success of·the ⁼throne of·him

3 °fire ¬in·front·of of·him will·¬go·before·himself and will·¬kindle encircling °the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·him

4 they·¬shined the⁺ ⁼¬lightnings⁺ of·him to·the ⁼¬world saw and was·¬shaken the ⁼earth

5 the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ they·¬melted ¬like ¬beeswax off of·face of·lord off of·face of·lord of·all ⁼the ⁼earth

6 they·¬announced the⁺ ⁼heavens⁺ °the ⁼justice of·him and they·saw all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼peoples⁺ °the ⁼glory of·him

7 ꜝlet·them·be·¬been·ashamed⁺ all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼worshipping to·the⁺ ⁼¬carving⁺ the⁺ ⁼self-¬boasting·of in to·the⁺ ⁼idols⁺ of·them ꜝworship⁺ to·him all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼announcers⁺ of·him

8 heard and was·¬celebrated ¬Zion and they·¬rejoiced·themselves the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·the ⁼Yudaea ¬because·of of·the⁺ ⁼judgments⁺ of·you lord

9 ¬that you you·are lord ⁼the ⁼Upmost upon °all ⁼the ⁼earth very you·were·over-upped over °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼Gods⁺

10 the⁺ ⁼loving °the ⁼lord you⁺·¬hate °evil keeps lord °the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sacred⁺ of·him out of·hand of·sinner⁺ will·¬rescue·himself °them

11 light ¬rised to·the ⁼just and to·the⁺ ⁼¬straight⁺ to·the ⁼heart ¬joy

12 you⁺·should·be·¬celebrated just⁺ upon to·the ⁼lord and you⁺·¬agree·yourselves⁺ to·the ⁼memory of·the ⁼holiness of·him

Psalm 97

1 psalm to·the ⁼David ꜝsing⁺ to·the ⁼lord °¬song °new ¬that °¬marvellous⁺ did lord saved to·him the·one °right⁺ of·him and the ⁼arm ⁼the ⁼holy of·him

2 made·known lord °the ⁼salvation of·him ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ¬revealed °the ⁼justice of·him

3 was·memoried of·the ⁼mercy of·him to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob and of·the ⁼¬truth of·him to·the ⁼house of·Yisra’el they·saw all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬ends⁺ of·the ⁼earth °the ⁼salvation of·the ⁼God of·us

4 ꜝ¬wail⁺ to·the ⁼God all ⁼the ⁼earth ꜝsing⁺ and you⁺·¬rejoice·yourselves⁺ and ꜝpsalm⁺

5 ꜝpsalm⁺ to·the ⁼lord in to·guitar in to·guitar and to·voice of·psalm

6 in to·trumpets⁺ ⁼hammered⁺ and to·voice of·trumpet ⁼horn ꜝ¬wail⁺ in·the·eye of·the ⁼king ⁼lord

7 ꜝlet·be·¬shaken the ⁼sea and the ⁼¬fulfillment of·her the ⁼¬world and the⁺ ⁼housing·down in to·her

8 rivers⁺ they·will·¬clap to·hand upon °the °it °the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ they·will·¬rejoice·themselves

Psalm 98

1 psalm to·the ⁼David the ⁼lord became·king ꜝlet·them·enrage⁺·themselves peoples⁺ the ⁼self-¬sitting upon of·the⁺ ⁼¬Cherubs⁺ ꜝlet·be·¬shaken the ⁼earth

2 lord in to·¬Zion great and upward is upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼peoples⁺

3 ꜝlet·them·¬agree⁺·themselves to·the ⁼name of·you to·the ⁼great ¬that ¬fearful and holy is

4 and honor of·king °judgment loves you you·prepared °¬righteousnesses⁺ °judgment and °justice in to·Ya‘aqob you you·did

5 ꜝup⁺ °lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us and ꜝworship⁺ to·the ⁼¬footstool of·the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·him ¬that holy is

6 Mosheh and Aharon in to·the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ of·him and ¬Samuel in to·the⁺ ⁼self-¬calling °the ⁼name of·him they·¬called·themselves °the ⁼lord and he ¬listened·to of·them

7 in to·column of·cloud spoke unto °them they·kept °the⁺ ⁼witnesses⁺ of·him and °the⁺ ⁼orders⁺ ⁼which⁺ gave to·them

8 lord the ⁼God of·us you you·¬listened·to of·them the ⁼God you ¬propitious you·were·generated·yourself to·them and ¬avenging upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬practices⁺ of·them

9 ꜝup⁺ °lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us and you⁺·worship to °mountain °holy of·him ¬that holy ⁼lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us

Psalm 99

Psalm 100

1 to·the ⁼David psalm °mercy and °judgment I·will·sing·myself to·you lord

2 I·will·psalm and I·will·¬understand in to·path to·¬blameless ¬when? you·will·arrive unto °me I·¬went·through·myself in to·¬innocence of·heart of·me in to·middle of·the ⁼house of·me

3 not I·¬planned·myself ¬before of·eyes⁺ of·me °¬thing ⁼¬lawbreaker °doing °¬transgressions⁺ I·¬hated

4 not was·¬joined to·me heart ⁼¬crooked of·¬turning·from off myˊ of·the ⁼evil not I·knew

5 °the ⁼¬slandering ¬quietly of·the ⁼¬neighbor of·him °this I·¬persecuted to·¬arrogant ⁼eye and to·¬insatiable to·heart to·this not I·¬ate·with

6 the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·me upon °the⁺ ⁼¬faithful⁺ of·the ⁼earth of·the·one to·¬sit·with °them with myˊ self-going in to·path ⁼¬blameless this to·me ¬ministered

7 not housed·down in to·middle of·the ⁼house of·me doing °¬pride speaking °¬unjust⁺ not ¬guided ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·me

Psalm 101

1 prayer to·the ⁼poor ¬when should·¬be·discouraged and ¬in·front·of of·lord should·pour·out °the ⁼¬petition of·him

2 ꜝlisten·to lord of·the ⁼prayer of·me and the ⁼cry of·me unto °you ꜝlet·come

3 ńot you·should·¬turn·away °the ⁼face of·you off myˊ in to·which iᵮ to·day I·should·¬press·on·myself °¬bowing ⁼the ⁼ear of·you unto °me in to·which iᵮ to·day I·should·¬call·myself °you ¬quickly ꜝlisten·to of·me

4 ¬that they·¬failed ¬like ¬smoke the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·me and the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·me ¬like ¬dried·sticks they·¬parched

5 attack ¬like ¬grass and was·dried·up the ⁼heart of·me ¬that I·¬forgot·myself of·the·one to·¬eat °the ⁼bread of·me

6 off of·voice of·the ⁼¬groan of·me was·¬joined the ⁼bone of·me to·the ⁼flesh of·me

7 I·was·¬likened to·¬pelican ⁼deserted I·was·been·generated ¬like ¬owl in to·¬area

8 I·¬was·watchful and I·was·been·generated ¬like °¬sparrow ⁼¬living·alone upon to·building

9 °the ⁼whole ⁼day they·¬reproached °me the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·me and the⁺ ⁼¬praising °me ¬by myˊ they·swore

10 ¬that °¬ashes ¬like °bread I·¬ate and °the ⁼¬drink of·me with of·¬weeping I·¬diluted

11 off of·face of·the ⁼raging of·you and of·the ⁼¬wrath of·you ¬that you·¬lifted·up you·¬broke·down °me

12 the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·me ¬like shadow they·were·¬bowed and I* ¬like ¬grass I·was·dried·up

13 you then lord to °the ⁼eternity you·remain and the ⁼memorial of·you to °generation and °generation

14 you standing·uꝑ you·will·¬have·compassion °the ⁼¬Zion ¬that ¬time of·the·one to·¬have·compassion °her ¬that arrives ¬time

15 ¬that they·¬delighted the⁺ ⁼servants⁺ of·you °the⁺ ⁼stones⁺ of·her and °the ⁼dust of·her they·will·¬have·compassion

16 and they·will·be·afraid the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ °the ⁼name of·lord and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ of·the ⁼earth °the ⁼glory of·you

17 ¬that will·housebuild lord °the ⁼¬Zion and will·be·seen in to·the ⁼glory of·him

18 ¬looked·upon upon °the ⁼prayer of·the⁺ ⁼¬lowly⁺ and not ¬was·rejected °the ⁼¬petition of·them

19 ꜝlet·be·written this to °generation ⁼óther and people ⁼the ⁼self-¬creating to·praise °the ⁼lord

20 ¬that ¬looked·out·of out of·upwardness ⁼holy of·him lord out of·heaven upon °the ⁼earth ¬looked·upon

21 of·the·one to·hear °the ⁼¬groan of·the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬shackled of·the·one to·¬loose °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼having·self-put·to·death

22 of·the·one to·¬announce in to·¬Zion °the ⁼name of·lord and °the ⁼praise of·him in to·Yerushalam

23 in to·the·one to·be·¬assembled °peoples⁺ upon °the °it and of·kingdom of·the·one to·serve to·the ⁼lord

24 was·answered to·him in to·path of·strength of·him °the ⁼¬fewness of·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·me ꜝ¬announce to·me

25 ńot you·should·¬lead °me in to·half of·days⁺ of·me in to·generation of·generations⁺ °the⁺ ⁼years⁺ of·you

26 ¬by °¬beginnings⁺ you lord °the ⁼earth you·founded and works⁺ of·the·ones⁺ of·hands⁺ of·you they·are the⁺ ⁼heavens⁺

27 they they·will·destroy·themselves you then you·will·¬remain and all⁺ as cloak they·will·be·¬getted·old and ¬like °¬covering you·will·¬change °them and they·will·be·¬changed

28 you then the he you·are and the⁺ ⁼years⁺ of·you not they·will·¬fail

29 the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼servants⁺ of·you they·will·¬dwell and the ⁼seed of·them to °the ⁼eternity will·be·¬guided

Psalm 102

1 to·the ⁼David ꜝ¬praise the ⁼soul of·me °the ⁼lord and all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬inside of·me °the ⁼name ⁼the ⁼holy of·him

2 ꜝ¬praise the ⁼soul of·me °the ⁼lord and ńot ꜝ¬forget·yourself °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬rewards⁺ of·him

3 °the ⁼¬propitiating to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·you °the ⁼self-¬healing °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬illnesses⁺ of·you

4 °the ⁼self-¬ransoming out of·¬corruption °the ⁼life of·you °the ⁼crowning °you in to·mercy and to·¬compassions⁺

5 °the ⁼¬filling·up in to·good⁺ °the ⁼¬desire of·you will·be·¬restored as of·eagle the ⁼youth of·you

6 doing °¬charities⁺ the ⁼lord and °judgment to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬harming

7 made·known °the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·him to·the ⁼Mosheh to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °the⁺ ⁼wills⁺ of·him

8 of·¬compassionate⁺ and ¬merciful ⁼the ⁼lord ⁼¬lenient and ¬full·of·mercy

9 not to °completion will·be·enraged not·then to °the ⁼eternity will·¬be·infuriated

10 not ¬by °the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·us did to·us not·then ¬by °the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·us ¬repayed to·us

11 ¬that ¬by °the ⁼upwardness of·the ⁼heaven off of·the ⁼earth grew·mighty lord the ⁼mercy of·him upon °the⁺ ⁼self-fearing °him

12 ¬by °whatever they·¬have·in·full ¬easts⁺ off of·wests⁺ ¬prolonged off of·us °the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·us

13 ¬as ¬has·compassion father °sons⁺ ¬had·compassion lord °the⁺ ⁼self-fearing °him

14 ¬that he knew °the ⁼shapework of·us ꜝmemory ¬that dust we·are

15 human ¬like ¬grass the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·him ¬like °¬flower of·the ⁼field thus will·¬blossom

16 ¬that breath ¬passed·through in to·him and not will·¬possess and not will·¬come·to·know·himself still °the ⁼¬place of·him

17 then the ⁼mercy of·the ⁼lord off of·the ⁼eternity and till of·the ⁼eternity upon °the⁺ ⁼self-fearing °him and the ⁼justice of·him upon °sons⁺ of·sons⁺

18 to·the·ones⁺ they·keep °the ⁼¬covenant of·him and to·having·self-memoried of·the⁺ ⁼commandments⁺ of·him of·the·one to·do °them

19 lord in to·the ⁼heaven prepared °the ⁼throne of·him and the ⁼kingdom of·him of·all⁺ is·master

20 ꜝ¬praise⁺ °the ⁼lord all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼announcers⁺ of·him potential⁺ to·strength doing °the ⁼saying of·him of·the·one to·hear of·the ⁼voice of·the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·him

21 ꜝ¬praise⁺ °the ⁼lord all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼powers⁺ of·him ¬ministers⁺ of·him doing °the ⁼will of·him

22 ꜝ¬praise⁺ °the ⁼lord all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·him in to·all ⁼¬place of·the·one ¬??? of·him ꜝ¬praise the ⁼soul of·me °the ⁼lord

Psalm 103

1 to·the ⁼David ꜝ¬praise the ⁼soul of·me °the ⁼lord lord the ⁼God of·me you·were·¬greatened very °¬acknowledgment and °¬beauty you·¬put·on·yourself

2 self-¬defering °light as °cloak ¬stretching·out °the ⁼heaven ¬like °¬hide·covering

3 the ⁼¬roofing in to·waters⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬upper·rooms⁺ of·him the ⁼putting °clouds⁺ °the ⁼¬step of·him the ⁼¬walking upon of·wings⁺ of·¬winds⁺

4 the ⁼doing °the⁺ ⁼announcers⁺ of·him breaths⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬ministers⁺ of·him fire ⁼¬blazing

5 founded °the ⁼earth upon °the ⁼¬security of·her not will·be·¬bowed to °the ⁼eternity of·the ⁼eternity

6 abyss as cloak ⁼the ⁼¬covering of·him upon of·the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ they·will·stand·themselves water

7 off of·¬reproach of·you they·will·flee·themselves off of·voice ⁼¬thunder of·you they·will·¬be·timid

8 they·ascend °mountains⁺ and they·descend °plains⁺ to °¬place ⁼which you·founded to·them

9 °region you·put·yourself °which not they·will·¬pass·by·themselves not·then they·will·¬turn to·cover °the ⁼earth

10 the ⁼¬sending·out °wells⁺ in to·¬valleys⁺ ¬each °middle of·the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ they·will·¬pass·through·themselves °water

11 they·will·give·drink all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼field they·will·¬wait·for·themselves ¬wild·donkeys⁺ to °thirst of·them

12 upon °them ⁼the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven will·¬dwell out of·middle of·the⁺ ⁼rocks⁺ they·will·give °voice

13 giving·drink °mountains⁺ out of·the⁺ ⁼¬upper·rooms⁺ of·him off of·fruit of·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·you will·be·¬feeded the ⁼earth

14 ¬sprouting·up °¬grass to·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ and °green to·the ⁼servitude of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ of·the·one to·bring·out °bread out of·the ⁼earth

15 and wine ¬celebrates °heart of·human of·the·one to·¬make·happy °face in to·¬olive·oil and bread °heart of·human ¬establishes

16 will·be·¬feeded the⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ of·the ⁼plain the⁺ ⁼¬Kidrons⁺ of·the Libanou °which⁺ ¬planted

17 there ¬sparrow ¬??? of·the ⁼¬heron the ⁼house ¬governs·himself of·them

18 mountains⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼upward⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼¬hind⁺ rock ⁼¬refuge to·the⁺ ⁼¬hyraxes⁺

19 did °luna to °¬times⁺ the ⁼sun knew °the ⁼¬sunset of·him

20 you·put·yourself darkness and was·generated·himself night in to·her they·will·¬pass·through·themselves °all the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼¬grove

21 ¬cubs⁺ ⁼self-¬roaring to·¬seize and to·seek ¬from of·the ⁼God °¬eating to·them

22 ¬rised the ⁼sun and they·were·¬assembled and in to·the⁺ ⁼¬havens⁺ of·them they·will·be·bedded

23 will·come·out·himself human upon °the ⁼work of·him and upon °the ⁼work of·him till of·¬evening

24 as was·¬greatened the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·you lord °all⁺ in to·wisdom you·did was·fulfilled the ⁼earth of·the ⁼¬possession of·you

25 this ⁼the ⁼sea ⁼the ⁼great and ¬wide·country there ¬reptiles⁺ of·which⁺ not is number ¬living·things⁺ ⁼little⁺ with of·great⁺

26 there °sailboats⁺ they·¬go·through·themselves dragon ⁼this °which you·shaped to·¬mock to·him

27 all⁺ unto °you they·should·¬look·for to·give °the ⁼¬food to·them °¬opportune

28 of·giving of·you to·them they·will·¬collect of·¬opening then of·you °the ⁼hand the⁺ ⁼¬all·things⁺ they·will·be·filled of·¬kindness

29 of·¬turning·away then of·you the ⁼face they·will·be·¬troubled you·will·¬take·away·in·return °the ⁼breath of·them and they·will·¬fail and to °the ⁼dust of·them they·will·¬turn

30 you·will·¬send·out °the ⁼breath of·you and they·will·be·¬created and you·will·¬restore °the ⁼face of·the ⁼earth

31 ꜝlet·be the ⁼glory of·lord to °the ⁼eternity will·be·¬celebrated lord upon to·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·him

32 the ⁼¬looking·upon upon °the ⁼earth and doing °her to·¬tremble the ⁼self-touching of·the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ and they·¬smoke·themselves

33 I·will·sing to·the ⁼lord in to·the ⁼life of·me I·will·psalm to·the ⁼God of·me till I·¬possess

34 may·be·¬been·delicious to·him the ⁼¬versification of·me I* then I·will·be·¬celebrated upon to·the ⁼lord

35 may·they·¬fail sinner⁺ off of·the ⁼earth and ¬lawless⁺ ¬so ńot to·¬possess °them ꜝ¬praise the ⁼soul of·me °the ⁼lord

Psalm 104

1 hallelu-ʏᴀʜ ꜝ¬agree⁺·yourselves⁺ to·the ⁼lord and ꜝ¬call⁺·yourselves⁺ °the ⁼name of·him ꜝ¬announce⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·him

2 ꜝsing⁺ to·him and ꜝpsalm⁺ to·him ꜝ¬relate·fully⁺·yourselves⁺ °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬marvelous⁺ of·him

3 you⁺·¬praise·yourselves⁺ in to·the ⁼name to·the ⁼holy of·him ꜝlet·be·¬celebrated heart of·seeking °the ⁼lord

4 ꜝseek⁺ °the ⁼lord and ꜝbe·grown·mighty⁺ ꜝseek⁺ °the ⁼face of·him through of·all

5 you⁺·should·memory of·the⁺ ⁼¬marvelous⁺ of·him of·which⁺ did °the⁺ ⁼¬wonderses⁺ of·him and °the⁺ ⁼judgments⁺ of·the ⁼mouth of·him

6 seed of·Abraham servants⁺ of·him sons⁺ of·Ya‘aqob ¬select⁺ of·him

7 he ⁼lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us in to·all ⁼the ⁼earth the⁺ ⁼judgments⁺ of·him

8 memoried to °the ⁼eternity of·¬covenant of·him ⁼saying ⁼which commanded·himself to °thousand⁺ ⁼generations⁺

9 °which ¬made·a·covenant·himself to·the ⁼Abraham and of·the ⁼¬oath of·him to·the ⁼Yitzchaq

10 and stood °her to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob to °order and to·the ⁼Yisra’el °¬covenant ⁼eternal

11 saying to·you I·will·give °the ⁼earth ⁼¬Canaan °¬measured·out·line of·law-lot of·you⁺

12 in to·the·one to·be °them to·number °¬little⁺ ⁼¬very·few⁺ and °¬foreigner⁺ in to·her

13 and they·¬passed·through out of·nation to °nation out of·kingdom to °people ⁼óther

14 not ¬released °human to·¬harm °them and ¬rebuked over of·them °kings⁺

15 ńot you⁺·touch·yourselves⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼Christ⁺ of·me and in to·the⁺ ⁼prophets⁺ of·me ńot you⁺·¬act·wickedly·yourselves⁺

16 and called °famine upon °the ⁼earth °all ⁼¬reliance of·bread ¬broke

17 missioned·off ¬before of·them °human to °servant was·sold Yosef

18 they·¬humbled in to·fetters⁺ °the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·him °iron ¬passed·through the ⁼soul of·him

19 ¬until of·the·one to·come °the ⁼saying of·him °the ⁼¬oracles of·lord ¬burned °him

20 missioned·off king and ¬loosed °him ¬leader of·peoples⁺ and ¬released °him

21 ¬appointed °him ⁼lord of·the ⁼house of·him and °¬leader of·all ⁼the ⁼¬possession of·him

22 of·the·one to·¬instruct °the⁺ ⁼¬leaders⁺ of·him as °himself and °the⁺ ⁼¬elders⁺ of·him to·¬make·wise

23 and came·to Yisra’el to °Egypt and Ya‘aqob ¬was·a·stranger in to·earth Cham

24 and ¬grew °the ⁼people of·him very and grew·mighty °him over °the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·him

25 ¬changed °the ⁼heart of·them of·the·one to·¬hate °the ⁼people of·him of·the·one to·self-¬deceive in to·the⁺ ⁼servants⁺ of·him

26 ¬sended·out °Mosheh ⁼the ⁼servant of·him °Aharon ⁼which ¬selected·himself °him

27 put·himself in to·them °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼signs⁺ of·him and of·the⁺ ⁼¬wonderses⁺ in to·earth Cham

28 ¬sended·out °darkness and darkened and they·¬rebelled °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·him

29 ¬changed °the⁺ ⁼waters⁺ of·them to °blood and killed·off °the⁺ ⁼fishes⁺ of·them

30 ¬crept·forth the ⁼earth of·them °frogs⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼¬inner·rooms⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ of·them

31 told and came ¬dog-fly and ¬midges⁺ in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼regions⁺ of·them

32 put·himself °the⁺ ⁼¬rains⁺ of·them °¬hail °fire ⁼¬burning·up in to·the ⁼earth of·them

33 and struck °the⁺ ⁼vines⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼¬fig·trees⁺ of·them and ¬broke °all ⁼¬wood of·region of·them

34 told and came ¬locust and ¬grasshopper of·which not was number

35 and ¬devoured °all ⁼the ⁼¬grass in to·the ⁼earth of·them and ¬devoured °the ⁼fruit of·the ⁼earth of·them

36 and struck all °¬firstborn in to·the ⁼earth of·them °¬firstfruits of·all ⁼evil of·them

37 and brought·out °them in to·silver and to·gold and not was in to·the⁺ ⁼tribes⁺ of·them ⁼infirm⁺

38 was·¬celebrated Egypt in to·the ⁼¬departure of·them ¬that ¬fell the ⁼fear of·them upon °them

39 ¬opened·and·spread·out °cloud to °¬shelter to·them and °fire of·the·one to·light to·them °the ⁼night

40 they·requested and came ¬mother-quail and °bread of·heaven ¬filled·up °them

41 ¬tore °rock and they·¬flowed °water they·were·gone in to·¬waterless⁺ rivers⁺

42 ¬that memoried of·the ⁼saying ⁼the ⁼holy of·him ⁼the·one unto °Abraham ⁼the ⁼servant of·him

43 and brought·out °the ⁼people of·him in to·¬joy and °the⁺ ⁼¬select⁺ of·him in to·¬joy

45 ¬that iᵮ they·should·keep °the⁺ ⁼just·deeds⁺ of·him and °the ⁼law of·him they·should·seek·out

Psalm 105

1 hallelu-ʏᴀʜ ꜝ¬agree⁺·yourselves⁺ to·the ⁼lord ¬that ¬good ¬that to °the ⁼eternity the ⁼mercy of·him

2 what will·speak °the⁺ ⁼¬commands⁺ of·the ⁼lord °¬audible⁺ will·do °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼praises⁺ of·him

3 blessed⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼keeping °judgment and doing °justice in to·all ⁼¬time

4 ꜝmemory of·us lord in to·the ⁼¬goodwill of·the ⁼people of·you ꜝ¬oversee·yourself °us in to·the ⁼salvation of·you

5 of·the·one to·see in to·the ⁼¬kindness of·the⁺ ⁼¬select⁺ of·you of·the·one to·be·¬celebrated in to·the ⁼¬joy of·the ⁼nation of·you of·the·one to·self-¬praise with of·the ⁼law-lot of·you

6 we·sinned with of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·us we·¬acted·lawlessly we·¬harmed

7 the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·us in to·Egypt not they·¬understanded °the⁺ ⁼¬marvelous⁺ of·you not they·memoried of·the ⁼multitude ⁼the·one °mercies⁺ of·you and they·¬rebelled ascending in to·the ⁼¬Red·Sea ⁼sea

8 and saved °them ¬because·of of·the ⁼name of·him of·the·one to·make·known °the ⁼¬command of·him

9 and ¬rebuked to·the ⁼¬Red·Sea ⁼sea and was·dried·up and ¬guided °them in to·abyss as in to·desert

10 and saved °them out of·hand of·¬hating and ¬ransomed·himself °them out of·hand of·enemy

11 and covered water °the⁺ ⁼¬pressing·on °them one out of·them not was·¬left

27 and of·the·one to·be·going·to·¬lay °the ⁼seed of·them in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ and to·¬scatter °them in to·the⁺ ⁼countries⁺

30 and stood Finees and calmed·out·himself and ¬abated the ⁼¬devastation

Psalm 106

1 hallelu-ʏᴀʜ ꜝ¬agree⁺·yourselves⁺ to·the ⁼lord ¬that ¬good ¬that to °the ⁼eternity the ⁼mercy of·him

2 ꜝlet·them·tell⁺ the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬ransomed ¬by of·lord °which⁺ ¬ransomed·himself out of·hand of·enemy

3 out of·the⁺ ⁼countries⁺ ¬assembled °them off of·¬easts⁺ and of·wests⁺ and of·north and of·sea

4 they·were·led·wandering in to·the ⁼desert in to·¬waterless °path of·city of·housing-down not they·found

5 hungering and thirsting the ⁼soul of·them in to·them ¬failed

6 and they·cried unto °lord in to·the·one to·self-¬press·on °them and out of·the⁺ ⁼¬necessities⁺ of·them ¬rescued·himself °them

7 and ¬guided °them to °path ⁼¬straight of·the·one to·be·gone to °city of·housing-down

9 ¬that ¬feeded °soul ⁼empty and °soul ⁼hungering ¬filled·up of·good⁺

10 °self-¬sitting in to·darkness and to·shadow of·death °having·self-¬shackled in to·poverty and to·iron

11 ¬that they·¬rebelled °the⁺ ⁼¬oracleses⁺ of·the ⁼God and °the ⁼counsel of·the ⁼Upmost they·¬provoked

13 and they·cried unto °lord in to·the·one to·self-¬press·on °them and out of·the⁺ ⁼¬necessities⁺ of·them saved °them

14 and brought·out °them out of·darkness and of·shadow of·death and °the⁺ ⁼bonds⁺ of·them ¬tore

16 ¬that ¬broke °gates⁺ ⁼copper⁺ and °¬bars⁺ ⁼iron⁺ ¬broke·in·pieces·together

17 ¬helped·himself of·them out of·path ⁼¬lawlessness of·them for through °the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·them they·were·¬humbled

18 °all ⁼¬food ¬abhorred·himself the ⁼soul of·them and they·¬came·near till of·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·the ⁼death

20 missioned·off °the ⁼saying of·him and ¬healed·himself °them and ¬rescued·himself °them out of·the⁺ ⁼¬decays⁺ of·them

21 ꜝlet·them·¬agree⁺·themselves to·the ⁼lord °the⁺ ⁼mercies⁺ of·him and °the⁺ ⁼¬marvelous⁺ of·him to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺

22 and ꜝlet·them·¬sacrifice⁺ °¬sacrifice of·praise and ꜝlet·them·¬announce⁺ °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·him in to·¬joy

23 the⁺ ⁼descending to °the ⁼sea in to·sailboats⁺ doing °work in to·waters⁺ ⁼many⁺

24 they they·saw °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·lord and °the⁺ ⁼¬marvelous⁺ of·him in to·the ⁼¬deep

25 told and stood breath of·¬blast and was·upped the⁺ ⁼¬waves⁺ of·her

26 they·ascend till of·the⁺ ⁼heavens⁺ and they·descend till of·the⁺ ⁼abysss⁺ the ⁼soul of·them in to·bad⁺ ¬melted·himself

27 they·were·¬troubled they·were·¬shaken as the ⁼¬getting·drunk and all ⁼the ⁼wisdom of·them was·drunk·down

28 and they·cried unto °lord in to·the·one to·self-¬press·on °them and out of·the⁺ ⁼¬necessities⁺ of·them brought·out °them

29 and ¬commanded to·the ⁼¬blast and stood to °¬breeze and they·¬were·silent °the⁺ ⁼¬waves⁺ of·her

30 and they·were·¬celebrated ¬that they·¬were·quiet and ¬guided °them upon °lagoon of·will of·them

31 ꜝlet·them·¬agree⁺·themselves to·the ⁼lord °the⁺ ⁼mercies⁺ of·him and °the⁺ ⁼¬marvelous⁺ of·him to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺

33 put·himself °rivers⁺ to °desert and °¬thoroughfares⁺ of·waters⁺ to °thirst

36 and housed·down there °hungering and they·¬commended·themselves °city of·housing-down

38 and ¬praised °them and they·were·multiplied very and °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·them not ¬???

39 and they·were·¬lessened and they·were·done·bad off of·¬pressure of·bad⁺ and of·¬anguish

Psalm 107

1 song of·psalm to·the ⁼David

2 prepared ⁼the ⁼heart of·me the ⁼God prepared ⁼the ⁼heart of·me I·will·sing·myself and I·will·psalm in to·the ⁼glory of·me

3 ꜝbe·¬raised ¬psaltery and guitar I·will·be·¬raised of·¬dawn

4 I·will·¬agree·myself to·you in to·peoples⁺ lord and I·will·psalm to·you in to·nations⁺

5 ¬that great ¬above of·the⁺ ⁼heavens⁺ the ⁼mercy of·you and till of·the⁺ ⁼clouds⁺ the ⁼¬truth of·you

6 ꜝbe·upped upon °the⁺ ⁼heavens⁺ the ⁼God and upon °all ⁼the ⁼earth the ⁼glory of·you

7 ¬that iᵮ they·should·be·¬rescued the⁺ ⁼beloved⁺ of·you ꜝsave to·the ⁼right of·you and ꜝ¬listen·to of·me

8 the ⁼God spoke in to·the ⁼holy of·him I·will·be·upped and I·will·¬divide °¬portion and °the ⁼¬cavity of·the⁺ ⁼dwellings⁺ I·will·¬measure·out

9 myˊ is Galaad and myˊ is ¬Manasseh and ¬Ephraim ¬help of·the ⁼head of·me Yudah ⁼king of·me

10 Mōab ⁼¬kettle of·the ⁼hope of·me upon °the ⁼¬Idumea I·will·¬stretch·out °the ⁼¬sandal of·me to·me* othertribes⁺ they·¬subjected

11 what will·¬lead·away °me to °city of·¬passage what will·¬guide °me till of·the ⁼¬Idumea

12 ¬not! you the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼self-¬rejecting °us and not you·will·come·out·yourself the ⁼God in to·the⁺ ⁼powers⁺ of·us

13 ꜝgive to·us °¬help out of·¬pressure and vain ⁼salvation of·human

14 in to·the ⁼God we·will·do °power and he will·¬be·rejected °the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·us

Psalm 108

1 to °the ⁼completion to·the ⁼David psalm ⁼the ⁼God °the ⁼praise of·me ńot you·should·¬remain·silent

2 ¬that mouth of·sinner and mouth of·¬deceitful upon °me* was·¬opened they·spoke ¬by myˊ to·tongue ⁼¬deceitful

3 and to·sayings⁺ of·¬hatreds⁺ they·encircled °me and they·warred °me ¬freely

4 anti of·the·one to·love °me they·¬were·adversary °me I* then I·prayed·myself

5 and they·put ¬by myˊ °bad⁺ anti of·good⁺ and ¬hatred anti of·the ⁼¬affection of·me

6 ꜝ¬appoint upon °him ⁼sinner and ¬devilish ꜝlet·stand out of·right⁺ of·him

7 in to·the·one to·self-judge °him may·come·out having·self-¬condemned and the ⁼prayer of·him ꜝlet·be·generated·himself to °sin

8 ꜝlet·them·be·been·generated⁺ the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·him ¬few⁺ and °the ⁼¬oversight of·him may·take óther

9 ꜝlet·them·be·been·generated⁺ the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him orphan⁺ and the ⁼woman of·him widow

Psalm 125

1 song of·the⁺ ⁼¬stairses⁺ in to·the·one to·¬turn °lord °the ⁼battlechained of·¬Zion we·were·been·generated as having·self-¬pleaded

2 ŧhen was·filled of·¬joy the ⁼mouth of·us and the ⁼tongue of·us of·¬joy ŧhen they·will·¬say in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ¬greatened lord of·the·one to·do with of·them

6 self-going they·went·themselves and they·¬wept ¬taking·up °the⁺ ⁼seeds⁺ of·them self-coming then they·will·arrive in will·¬rejoice ¬taking·up °the⁺ ⁼¬sheafs⁺ of·them

Psalm 126

Psalm 134

Psalm 136

Psalm 138

1 to °the ⁼completion psalm to·the ⁼David lord you·¬tested °me and you·knew °me

2 you you·knew °the ⁼¬seat of·me and °the ⁼¬resurrection of·me you you·¬understanded °the⁺ ⁼¬reasonings⁺ of·me off ¬from·afar

3 °the ⁼¬path of·me and °the ⁼¬rush of·me you you·¬traced and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·me you·¬foreseed

4 ¬that not is saying in to·tongue of·me

5 ¬¡see! lord you you·knew °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼last⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬ancient⁺ you you·shaped °me and you·put upon °me* °the ⁼hand of·you

6 was·¬caused·wonder the ⁼knowledge of·you out myˊ was·grown·mighty not ńot I·should·have·power·myself unto °her

10 for and there the ⁼hand of·you will·¬guide °me and will·¬hold·back °me the·one °right⁺ of·you

11 and I·told ¬therefore darkness will·¬trample °me and night light in to·the ⁼¬self-indulgence of·me

12 ¬that °darkness not will·be·darkened off of·you and night as day will·be·lit as °the ⁼darkness of·her thus and °the ⁼light of·her

13 ¬that you you·¬possessed·yourself °the⁺ ⁼kidneys⁺ of·me lord you·¬helped·yourself of·me out of·womb ⁼mother of·me

Psalm 139

1 to °the ⁼completion psalm to·the ⁼David

2 ꜝ¬take·out °me lord out of·human ⁼evil off of·man ⁼¬unjust ꜝ¬rescue °me

3 whos⁺ they·¬counted·themselves °¬unrighteousnesses⁺ in to·heart °the ⁼whole ⁼day they·¬deployed·themselves °wars⁺

4 they·¬sharpened °tongue of·them ¬like of·¬snake ¬poison of·asps⁺ ¬by °the⁺ ⁼lips⁺ of·them ¬pause

5 ꜝkeep °me lord out of·hand of·sinner off of·humans⁺ ⁼¬unjust⁺ ꜝ¬take·out·yourself °me whos⁺ they·¬counted·themselves to·¬trip·up °the⁺ ⁼¬footsteps⁺ of·me

6 they·hid ¬arrogant⁺ °¬trap to·me and °¬ropes⁺ they·¬extended °¬traps⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·me °self-having of·¬path °¬stumbling·block they·put·themselves to·me ¬pause

7 I·told to·the ⁼lord God of·me you·are you ꜝ¬listen·to lord °the ⁼voice of·the ⁼¬petition of·me

8 lord ⁼lord power of·the ⁼salvation of·me you·¬overshadowed upon °the ⁼head of·me in to·day of·war

9 ńot you·should·¬deliver °me lord off of·the ⁼¬desire of·me to·sinner they·¬discussed·themselves ¬by myˊ ńot you·should·leave·out °me ¬lest they·should·be·upped ¬pause

10 the ⁼head of·the ⁼¬swirl of·them labor of·the⁺ ⁼lips⁺ of·them will·cover °them

11 they·will·¬collapse·themselves upon °them ¬charcoals⁺ in to·fire you·will·¬lay °them in to·¬miseries⁺ not ńot they·should·¬stand

12 man ⁼¬talkative not will·be·¬guided upon of·the ⁼earth °man ⁼¬unjust bad⁺ will·¬hunt to °¬decay

13 I·knew ¬that will·do lord °the ⁼judgment of·the ⁼poor and °the ⁼¬condemnation of·the⁺ ⁼¬poors⁺

14 ¬but just⁺ they·will·¬agree·themselves to·the ⁼name of·you and they·will·house·down ¬straight⁺ wiŧh to·the ⁼face of·you

Psalm 140

1 psalm to·the ⁼David lord I·cried unto °you ꜝlisten·to of·me ꜝ¬watch·out to·the ⁼voice of·the ⁼¬petition of·me in to·the·one to·have·cried °me unto °you

2 ꜝlet·be·¬guided the ⁼prayer of·me as ¬incense in·the·eye of·you ¬raising of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·me ¬sacrifice ⁼¬during·evening

3 ꜝput·yourself lord °keep to·the ⁼mouth of·me and °door of·¬passage about °the⁺ ⁼lips⁺ of·me

4 ńot you·should·¬turn·from °the ⁼heart of·me to °sayings⁺ of·evil of·the·one to·self-¬make·an·excuse °¬pretenses⁺ in to·sins⁺ wiŧh to·humans⁺ ⁼self-working °¬lawlessness and not ńot ¬??? with of·the⁺ ⁼¬select⁺ of·them

5 will·¬instruct °me just in to·mercy and will·¬rebuke °me ¬olive·oil then of·sinner ńot ꜝlet·¬anoint °the ⁼head of·me ¬that still and the ⁼prayer of·me in to·the⁺ ⁼¬goodwills⁺ of·them

6 they·were·drunk·down °self-having of·rock the⁺ ⁼judges⁺ of·them they·will·hear·themselves °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ of·me ¬that they·were·¬been·delicious

7 ¬like ¬thickness of·earth ¬??? upon of·the ⁼earth was·¬scattered °the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·us ¬from °the ⁼¬hell

8 ¬that unto °you lord ⁼lord the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·me upon °you I·hoped ńot you·should·be·¬taken·away·in·return °the ⁼soul of·me

9 ꜝkeep °me off of·¬trap ⁼which they·¬commended·themselves to·me and off of·¬stumbling·blocks⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼self-working °the ⁼¬lawlessness

10 they·will·¬collapse·themselves in to·¬net of·him sinner⁺ ¬by °only⁺ I·am I* till of·which iᵮ I·should·¬pass·by

Psalm 141

1 of·¬understanding to·the ⁼David in of·the·one to·be °him in to·the ⁼cave prayer

2 to·voice of·me unto °lord I·cried to·voice of·me unto °lord I·was·bound

3 I·will·pour·out ¬in·front·of of·him °the ⁼¬petition of·me °the ⁼¬pressure of·me in·the·eye of·him I·will·¬announce

4 in of·the·one to·¬fail out myˊ °the ⁼breath of·me and you you·knew °the⁺ ⁼¬paths⁺ of·me in to·path ⁼this ⁼which I·went·myself they·hid °¬trap to·me

5 they·¬observed to °the⁺ ⁼right⁺ and I·¬looked·upon ¬that not was the ⁼¬coming·to·know °me destroyed·himself fleeing off myˊ and not is the ⁼seeking·out °the ⁼soul of·me

6 I·cried unto °you lord I·told you you·are the ⁼hope of·me part of·me in to·earth of·living

7 ꜝ¬watch·out unto °the ⁼¬petition of·me ¬that I·was·¬humbled very ꜝ¬rescue·yourself °me out of·the⁺ ⁼¬seeking °me ¬that they·were·grown·mighty over °me*

8 ꜝbring·out out of·keep °the ⁼soul of·me of·the·one to·self-¬agree to·the ⁼name of·you lord °me* they·will·¬remain just⁺ till of·which you·should·¬repay to·me

Psalm 142

1 psalm to·the ⁼David when °him the ⁼son ¬seeks lord ꜝlisten·to of·the ⁼prayer of·me ꜝ¬listen·to·yourself °the ⁼¬petition of·me in to·the ⁼¬truth of·you ꜝ¬listen·to of·me in to·the ⁼justice of·you

2 and ńot you·should·come·to to °judgment with of·the ⁼servant of·you ¬that not will·be·justified in·the·eye of·you all ⁼living

3 ¬that ¬sought the ⁼enemy °the ⁼soul of·me ¬humbled to °earth ⁼the ⁼life of·me ¬seated °me in to·dark⁺ as °corpses⁺ of·eternity

4 and ¬was·discouraged upon °me* °the ⁼breath of·me in to·me* was·¬troubled the ⁼heart of·me

5 I·was·memoried of·days⁺ ⁼¬ancient⁺ and I·¬meditated in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·you in to·deeds⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you I·¬meditated

6 I·¬opened·and·spread·out °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·me unto °you the ⁼soul of·me as earth ⁼¬waterless to·you ¬pause

7 ¬quickly ꜝlisten·to of·me lord ¬failed the ⁼breath of·me ńot you·should·¬turn·away °the ⁼face of·you off myˊ and I·will·be·¬likened to·the·ones⁺ they·descend to °pit

8 ⁼¬audible ꜝdo to·me °the·one early °the ⁼mercy of·you ¬that upon to·you I·hoped ꜝmake·known to·me lord °path in to·which I·will·go·myself ¬that unto °you I·¬took·up °the ⁼soul of·me

9 ꜝ¬take·out·yourself °me out of·the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·me lord ¬that unto °you I·¬fled

10 ꜝteach °me of·the·one to·do °the ⁼will of·you ¬that you you·are the ⁼God of·me the ⁼breath of·you the·one good will·¬guide °me in to·earth ⁼¬straight

11 ¬because·of of·the ⁼name of·you lord you·will·live °me in to·the ⁼justice of·you you·will·bring·out out of·¬pressure °the ⁼soul of·me

12 and in to·the ⁼mercy of·you you·will·destroy °the⁺ ⁼enemies⁺ of·me and you·will·destroy °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬pressing·on °the ⁼soul of·me ¬that servant of·you I·am I*

Psalm 143

1 to·the ⁼David unto °the Goliad ¬praiseworthy ⁼lord ⁼the ⁼God of·me the ⁼teaching °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·me to °¬battle·array °the⁺ ⁼fingers⁺ of·me to °war

2 mercy of·me and ¬refuge of·me ¬shielder of·me and ¬rescuer of·me ¬defender of·me and upon to·him I·hoped the ⁼¬subjecting °the ⁼people of·me ¬by °me*

3 lord °what is human ¬that you·were·known to·him or son of·human ¬that you·should·¬count·yourself °him

4 human to·vanity was·¬likened the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·him ¬like shadow they·¬pass

5 lord ꜝ¬bow °heavens⁺ of·you and ꜝdescend you·should·touch·yourself of·the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ and they·will·be·¬smoked

6 ꜝ¬flash °¬lightning and you·will·¬scatter °them ꜝ¬send·out °the⁺ ⁼¬arrows⁺ of·you and you·will·¬disturb °them

7 ꜝ¬send·out °the ⁼hand of·you out of·upwardness ꜝ¬take·out·yourself °me and ꜝ¬rescue·yourself °me out of·waters⁺ ⁼many⁺ out of·hand of·sons⁺ ⁼¬another's⁺

8 ⁼which⁺ the ⁼mouth spoke °vanity and the ⁼right of·them right of·¬unrighteousness

Psalm 144

1 praise to·the ⁼David I·will·up °you the ⁼God of·me the ⁼king of·me and I·should·¬praise °the ⁼name of·you to °the ⁼eternity and to °the ⁼eternity of·the ⁼eternity

2 ¬by °each ⁼day I·should·¬praise °you and I·should·praise °the ⁼name of·you to °the ⁼eternity and to °the ⁼eternity of·the ⁼eternity

3 great ⁼lord and ¬praiseworthy very and of·the ⁼¬greatness of·him not is ¬end

4 generation and generation will·¬praise °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·you and °the ⁼power of·you they·will·¬announce

5 °the ⁼¬majesty of·the ⁼glory ⁼the ⁼holiness of·you they·will·speak and °the⁺ ⁼¬marvelous⁺ of·you they·will·¬relate·fully·themselves

6 and °the ⁼power of·the⁺ ⁼¬fearful⁺ of·you they·will·¬say and °the ⁼¬greatness of·you they·will·¬relate·fully·themselves

7 °memory of·the ⁼multitude of·the ⁼¬kindness of·you they·will·¬discharge·forth·themselves and to·the ⁼justice of·you they·will·¬rejoice·themselves

8 of·¬compassions⁺ and ¬merciful ⁼the ⁼lord ⁼¬lenient and ¬full·of·mercy

9 ⁼¬good ⁼lord to·the⁺ ⁼¬all·things⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬compassions⁺ of·him upon °all °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·him

10 ꜝlet·them·¬agree⁺·themselves to·you lord °all °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·you and the⁺ ⁼sacred⁺ of·you ꜝlet·them·¬praise⁺ °you

11 °glory of·the ⁼kingdom of·you they·will·¬say and °the ⁼¬command of·you they·will·speak

12 of·the·one to·make·known to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ °the ⁼¬command of·you and °the ⁼glory of·the ⁼¬majesty ⁼the ⁼kingdom of·you

13 the ⁼kingdom of·you kingdom of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼eternities⁺ and the ⁼mastery of·you in to·all ⁼generation and to·generation ¬faithful ⁼lord in to·the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·him and sacred in to·all⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·him

14 ¬supports lord °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬falling·down and ¬restores °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬broken·down

15 the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·all⁺ to °you they·hope and you you·give °the ⁼¬food of·them in to·¬opportunity

16 you·¬open you °the ⁼hand of·you and you·¬fill·up °all ⁼¬living·thing of·¬goodwill

17 just ⁼lord in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·him and sacred in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·him

18 ¬near lord to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬calling °him to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬calling °him in to·¬truth

19 °will of·the⁺ ⁼self-fearing °him will·do and of·the ⁼¬petition of·them will·¬listen·to·himself and will·save °them

20 keeps lord °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼loving °him and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sinner⁺ will·destroy

Psalm 145

1 hallelu-ʏᴀʜ Aggaiou and of·¬Zechariah ꜝpraise the ⁼soul of·me °the ⁼lord

2 I·should·praise °lord in to·life of·me I·will·psalm to·the ⁼God of·me till I·¬possess

3 ńot you⁺·have·¬persuaded upon °¬leaders⁺ and upon °sons⁺ of·humans⁺ to·which⁺ not is salvation

4 will·come·out·himself °the ⁼breath of·him and will·¬turn to °the ⁼earth of·him in to·that ⁼the ⁼day they·will·destroy·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬reasonings⁺ of·them

5 blessed of·which the ⁼God of·Ya‘aqob ¬helper the ⁼hope of·him upon °lord ⁼the ⁼God of·him

6 °the ⁼doing ⁼the ⁼heaven and °the ⁼earth ⁼the ⁼sea and °all °the·ones⁺ in to·them °the ⁼keeping °¬truth to °the ⁼eternity

7 ⁼doing °judgment to·the⁺ ⁼self-¬harming °giving °¬food to·the·ones⁺ they·hunger lord ¬looses °having·self-¬shackled

8 lord ¬restores °self-¬breaking·down lord wise⁺ °¬blind⁺ lord loves °just⁺

9 lord keeps °the⁺ ⁼¬proselytes⁺ °orphan and °widow will·¬take·up·himself and °path of·sinner⁺ will·¬destroy

10 will·become·king lord to °the ⁼eternity the ⁼God of·you of·¬Zion to °generation and °generation

Psalm 146

1 hallelu-ʏᴀʜ Aggaiou and of·¬Zechariah ꜝpraise⁺ °the ⁼lord ¬that good psalm to·the ⁼God of·us may·be·¬been·delicious praise

3 the ⁼self-¬healing °the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬broken °the ⁼heart and binding °the⁺ ⁼¬ruins⁺ of·them

5 great ⁼the ⁼lord of·us and great ⁼the ⁼strength of·him and of·the ⁼¬understanding of·him not is number

Psalm 147

Psalm 148

Psalm 149

Psalm 150
